Esto es justamente lo que garantiza el éxito de su credikiva, porque responde a una demanda evidente y en el marco de la mejor temporada del año para vender, pues sus clientes usualmente reciben las primas y bonificaciones semestrales y tienen dinero suficiente para comprar en el negocio de Jacquelin.
texts.en: Jacquelin is 50 years old, sells clothing items such as clothes, foot ware, bags, and fantasy jewelry. She accepts cash and credit from a clientele that has been growing little by little. Jacquelin used to be employed but during her free time she began her business. Once her clientele expanded as well as demand for her products she felt she did not have the time to start her business. That is when she decided to quit working and dedicate all of her time to commerce. Her clientele is formed by company employees, neighbors, families, and references. The demand for products gradually increased and it is difficult for her to meet their demands. She first must invest in her business then satisfy her clients. Having sufficient funds for her business has turned into and obstacle which is why she has requested Kiva and the Mario Santo Domingo Foundation her first loan. She will use the loan to buy wallets, bags, belts, and bed sheets which are items that circulate with the most ease and have been ordered by potential clients. This loan will guarantee a successful business since she provides products clients want and this is the season to sell them because they receive their checks and have money to spend on her store.

loans.use: buy wallets, bags, belts, and bed sheets

loans.name: Jaime

texts.es:
Jaime tiene 34 años de edad, es soltero y no tiene hijos, vive en uno de los caseríos que conforman la zona rural del distrito de Tambogrande, una zona dedicada a la agricultura, productora de mango y limón. Pertenece a la región Piura.

Se dedica a brindar servicio de transporte de carga y pasajeros en una mototaxi (vehículo consiste en una motocicleta a la cual se le acopla una cabina especial para usos de transporte), usualmente transporta pasajeros entre los caseríos cercanos. Adicionalmente cuenta con un negocio de crianza y venta de animales menores. El cuenta con más de tres años de experiencia en estas actividades.

 Jaime se encuentra solicitando a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1000 nuevos soles que piensa utilizar en la compra de alimentos para su ganado y así venderlos a un mejor precio, además de realizar mantenimiento de su mototaxi, lo cual le permitirá mejorar su calidad de vida.

El es una persona emprendedora y trabajadora, las personas que le conocen le consideran alguien servicial y responsable.
texts.en:
Jaime is 34, single, and does not have children. He is a enterprising and hard-working man. Those who know him consider him to be a helpful and responsible person. He lives in a small village that forms part of the rural Tambogrande district, an area dedicated to agriculture and the production of mangos and lemons. Tambogrande is part of the Piura region.

Jaime works by providing transportation services to passengers in a motor taxi, a vehicle that consists of a motorcycle connected to a special cabin used to transport people. Usually, he transports passengers between the nearby villages. He also manages a business that consists of raising and selling small livestock. He has over 3 years experience in both of these ventures.

Jaime is requesting a loan of 1000 nuevo soles from Edpyme Alternativa, which he will use to buy food for his livestock so he can then sell them at a better price, in addition to performing maintenance on his motor taxi. This will allow him to have a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy nutritional feed to improve his business of raising and selling animals

loans.name: Rosario Del Carmen

texts.es: Desde Manta, maravillosa y turística ciudad costera de Ecuador conocimos a Rosario. Tiene 58 años y está casada con Francisco. Su esposo se dedica hace 12 años a la soldadura haciendo puertas, ventanas y objetos de metal. Tiene una hija quien es mayor de edad y está casada. Rosario tiene una ferretería la cual está ubicada en su domicilio. Abrió el negocio porque siempre le a gustado el comercio pero como era ama de casa no podía desarrollarse en ese aspecto. Conversando con su esposo un día nació la idea y con un capital ahorrado empezaron. Al principio fue difícil obtener clientes pero pasando el tiempo se dieron a conocer. La ferretería tiene 4 años de funcionamiento y les va muy bien, es Rosario quien la atiende y cuando su hija la visita le ayuda con la limpieza y la atención. El local lo abre todos los días desde la mañana hasta la tarde y no ha tenido ningún problema hasta ahora. Rosario desea hacer el crédito para la compra de cajas de herramientas completas. Su sueño es ampliar su casa y negocio a fin de hacerlo más grande y espacioso.
texts.en: In Manta, a marvelous and beautiful tourist city on the coast of Ecuador, we met Rosario. She is 58 years old and married to Francisco. Her husband has been a welder for 12 years. He makes doors, windows and metal objects. She has a daughter who is grown and married. Rosario has a hardware store located in her house. She opened the business because she has always liked doing business, but since she was a housewife she wasn't able to develop herself that way.Talking to her husband one day she got the idea and with some capital they had saved up they started. At first it was difficult to find customers but over time they became better known. The hardware store has been running for 4 years and it is going very well for them. Rosario tends to it and when her daughter visits she helps her with the cleaning and serving customers. The locale is open every day from morning to night and has had no problems so far. Rosario wants to take out the loan to buy some complete toolboxes. Her dream is to add on to her house and her business to make it bigger and more spacious.

loans.use: to buy toolboxes.

loans.name: Chizi

texts.en:
Chizi is an entrepreneur who has made progress in her goal thanks to her capacity to work and love for her family, which consists of her five children. She is the owner of a business, which she began nine years ago, generating an income for the family by making and selling chapati (flat bread) and beans.  Little by little Chizi has been able to expand what she offers, preparing food and other distinctive products, and now she has a domestic market made up of her neighbors, many of them working with no time for meal preparation. 

Her dream is to grow and expand her market, but her working capital is often insufficient to meet her goals of prosperity. This is the reason why she is asking for a Kiva loan, her second financing through the Yehu Microfinance Trust, in order to purchase bundles of wheat flour, cooking fat oil, and sugar. Chizi will be able to get substantial discounts by buying in bulk, and this is the groundwork for the success of her Kiva loan that has her enthusiastic and hopeful.

loans.use: to purchase bundles of wheat flour, cooking fat oil, and sugar.

loans.name: Merilyn

texts.en:
Merilyn is from Tinaclaan, Clarin, Misamis Occidental. She is 43 years old. Merilyn is married and has 4 children. To earn a living, she plants and harvests bananas for sale. Merilyn has been in this business for 12 years and earns 14,000 PHP a month for these activities. 

She is requesting a loan of 11,700 PHP which will be used to purchase additional seeds, seedlings and young crops to raise. Merilyn has been a member of GDMPC for 2 years. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional seeds, seedlings and young crops to raise.

loans.name: Mariselina

texts.en:
Mariselina is a farmer in the Kitale area of western Kenya. She is married with four adult children and has been actively farming for 20 years. Her farm currently produces milk, maize, and potatoes, which are all sold within the local markets. She engages the services of one farmhand on a permanent basis in her farm.

Mariselina has requested a loan of 40,000 KES from Juhudi Kilimo to buy poultry for a venture into poultry farming. She wants start a poultry project with  1,000 birds and hopes to grow this to 5,000 in five years. She says the poultry business is advantageous, as it can flourish even during dry seasons unlike other crops which are seasonal. She hopes to build her capital through farming.

She is glad Juhudi Kilimo has made farming loans accessible to smallholder farmers.

loans.use: to buy poultry.

loans.name: Vicente Fernando

texts.es: Vicente vive en Playas zona costera conocida por el turismo. El nos da a conocer que a pesar del gran avance que a tenido en los últimos años del turismo a Playas le faltan mucha obras, como ejemplo nos comenta que a pesar de tener su casa propia de cemento solo cuenta con agua y luz pero les falta alcantarillado y camino pavimentado. A pesar de esto el tiene 21 años ejerciendo la labor de panadero. Empezó esta actividad en el sector de su tío quien tenía una panadería y lo contrato para que lo ayudara en la producción y venta. Le agradece las enseñanzas ya que esta es su forma de vida la cual le ayuda a mantener su familia. Ahora tiene un local en su domicilio donde trabaja solo de lunes a domingos desde las 7 de la mañana hasta las 9 de la noche. Vicente nos cuenta que cuando inicio el negocio era muy rentable ya que los productos para su elaboración eran económicos, ahora con el alza de precios es menos rentable por eso se concentra en el numero, entre mas produce más vende y mejoran sus ganancias. Espera obtener el crédito para comprar materia prima para la elaboración de los panes mejorando su negocio y contratar a un ayudante en un futuro próximo. Su esposa es licencia y trabaja en una empresa, tiene 3 hijos que estudian en la escuela fiscal.
texts.en: Vincente lives in Playas, a coastal area known for its tourism.  He tells us that in spite of the great progress made in recent years from tourism, Playas still lacks economic development.  For example, he tells us that in spite of having his own house made of cement with water and electrical utilities,  there is no sewer and the roads are not paved.  In spite of this, he has been working as a baker for 21 years.  He started this work in his uncle's neighborhood that had a bakery; they hired him to help with production and sales.  He is grateful for this training, because now this is the way he earns his living and supports his family.  He now has a store in his house where he works each day from 7am until 9 at night.  Vincente tells us that when he started the business it was very profitable, because the products he made were very economical.  Now with the increase in prices it is less profitable. Therefore, he focuses on numbers: the more he produces and sells, the greater his earnings.  He is hoping to obtain a loan so that he can buy raw materials to make the bread which will help his business, allowing him to hire an assistant in the near future.  His wife is a licensed and works for a company.  They have 3 children who are enrolled in the public school.

loans.use: to buy flour and yeast

loans.name: Wilson Overman

texts.es: Wilson tiene 41 años viviendo en Manta. Esta divorciado y sus hijos viven con la mamá. De momento no tiene más compromiso, dice estar disponible. Tiene una casa propia en la cual abrió una tienda de abarrotes, nos comenta que es la favorita del barrio y se debe a su atención o los productos que oferta. Al principio el negocio lo puso porque no quería trabajar teniendo un horario establecido ya que le gusta disponer de su tiempo en cualquier hora. Hace 2 años que empezó con la tienda la cual le da buenos resultados. Wilson nos comenta que al principio no le gustaba pero pasando el tiempo le empezó a coger amor al negocio, hoy en día no piensa cerrar por ningún motivo. La atención la brinda solo desde muy temprano en la mañana cerrando a las 9 de la noche. No tiene día de descanso por que siempre tiene algo que hacer como limpiar, arreglar las perchas, ver productos vencidos, hacer inventario en fin muchas actividades. Solicita el préstamo para comprar mercadería aumentando sus ventas y con esto estar más cerca de sus sueños que es comprar un vehículo.
texts.en:
Wilson is 41 years old and living in Manta. He is divorced and his children live with their mother. Currently he has no other commitments, he says he is debt free. 

He has his own house in which he opened a grocery store. He comments to us that it is a neighborhood favorite because of his attention to the products he offers. At first he opened the business because he wanted to work having a set schedule as he likes having free time at whatever hour. He opened the store two years ago with good results. Wilson tells us that at first he did not like spending the time but he began to love the business, and today would not think of closing for any reason. He attends the store from early in the morning until closing at 9:00PM in the evening. He does not have a rest day because there is always something to do such as cleaning, fixing the shelves, looking for outdated products, doing inventory and many more activities. 

He is asking for a loan in order to buy merchandise to increase his sales and thus to be closer to his dream which is to buy a vehicle.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar, food supplies, and household items

loans.name: Alipio Benito

texts.es:
Alipio es un hombre de 63 años, unido con Ricardina, una mujer de 61 años con quien vive en la parroquia de "Pacto" del cantón "Quito" donde se encuentra la capital del Ecuador. Esta parroquia rural se encuentra a dos horas de Quito acercándose a la región costa del país. En esta región la flora y fauna son sus principales características, la mayoría de habitantes se dedica a actividades agrícolas o ganaderas.

Alipio se dedica a la crianza de ganado vacuno para la obtención de leche, la misma que es vendida a los "recolectores" de la zona que son los encargados de recibir toda la leche del sector y enviarla a la pasteurizadora que los contrata. Alipio, si tuviera más ganado podría tener más leche y al venderla tendrá más ingresos; por este motivo él ha decidido en invertir en la compra de una vaca lechera y para ello se valdrá de un crédito.

Su tiempo libre se dedica a pasar en su hogar con su esposa que es ama de casa, y su sueño es mejorar su estilo de vida incrementando su negocio. El desea continuar con la producción de leche ya que es una actividad que le gusta.
texts.en:
Alipio is a 63 year ols man. He is with Ricardina, a 61 year old woman he lives with in the "Pacto" parish of the "Quito" canton, where the capital of Ecuador is. This rural parish is two hours from Quito and on the way to the coastal area of the country. The main characteristics of the region are its flora and fauna. Most of its residents work in farming and cattle raising.

Alipio raises cattle for milk. He sells the milk to area "collectors" who are in charge of receiving all of the milk in the area and sending it to the pasteurizer that hires them. If Alipio had more cattle he could have more milk and upon selling it have more income. That is why he has decided to invest in buying a dairy cow and to do that he will take out a loan.

IN his free time he likes to be at home with his wife, who is a housewife. His dream is to improve his quality of life by growing his business. He wants to conyinue with the milk production since it is an activity that he likes.

loans.use: to buy a dairy cow.

loans.name: Arlene

texts.en:
Arlene is 42 years old and married with 4 children. With all her children in school, Arlene works very hard to provide for them.

Arlene runs a variety store in the Philippines and has requested a loan of 23,000 PHP through NWTF to purchase more goods to sell.

Arlene has been in this business for 5 years and sells a variety of items such as canned goods, noodles, sugar and other groceries. 

In the future, Arlene would like to save enough money so that she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more goods to sell in her general store.

loans.name: Amparo

texts.es: Amparo  de 23 años de edad, es la propietaria de una sala de estética donde presta servicios de limpieza facial, tratamientos reductores y terapias posthospitalarias. Amparo es una madre excepcional, amorosa y  trabajadora, siempre movida por su empeño de sacar a su hija y hacer de ella una profesional exitosa. Vive con sus padres quienes han sido su apoyo principal y hoy con su trabajo en el negocio, ha logrado responderles a ellos también, de quienes vive muy agradecida. Su meta mas adelante es tener su casa propia y por eso se esmera en aumentar su clientela, con un buen servicio personal y profesional. En la actualidad planea acceder a un credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, mediante el cual comprará maquinarias y equipos de estética para lograr aumentar la calidad de su servicio e incrementar el volumen de ventas. Su inversión será exitosa porque cuenta con una potencial clientela y las capacidades profesionales, para lograr la fidelización y ahora con nuevas maquinarias que proporciona un servicio efectivo en un ambiente confortable, por lo que muy seguramente sus clientes regresaran y referirán los servicios que ofrece  Amparo en su sala de estética. .
texts.en: Amparo, who is 23 years old, is the proprietor of an aesthetic salon, where she offers services such as facial cleansing, reducing treatments, and post-hospital therapies. Amparo is an exceptional mother, loving and hard-working, always driven by her pledge to raise her daughter and have her become a successful professional. She lives with her parents, who have been her principal support, and now with her work in her business, she has managed to help them in return. and she is very grateful to them. Her goal in the future is to have her own house, and for this reason she wants to do her best to increase her customer base with good personal and professional service. Now she plans to access a Kiva loan, her first financing from Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, which she will use to buy machines and aesthetic equipment to improve the quality of her service and increase her sales volume. Her investment will be successful because she has a potential clientele and professional training to earn their loyalty, and now with the new machines she will provide effective service in comfortable surroundings, so surely her customers will return and will refer the services that Amparo offers in her aesthetic salon to others.

loans.use: to buy machines and aesthetic equipment

loans.name: Eng

texts.en:
Eng (in the photo) is 50 years old and her husband, Chat, is 52 years old; they live in a village about twenty kilometers from Phnom Penh City. They have five children--two sons and three daughters. Two are married, one is a garment worker, another has full-time employment and another one is a construction worker. 

Eng is hired to put together fabric swatches. Her husband is a farmer and house builder. Eng is applying for a loan of $1,000 to purchase a motorbike for her son who has full-time employment to get to work. Eng’s son works in Phnom Penh; however, because his home is quite far from the city he currently needs to stay at his workplace after work. With a motorbike, which he will buy with money from the loan, he will be able to come back home every evening to help support his mother at home.

loans.use: To buy a motorbike for her son to drive to work.

loans.name: Jacob

texts.en:
Jacob is a father of three children between seventeen and eight years old and lives with the family in their rural home where he is a farmer. His farm produce, which includes mainly maize, tomatoes, beans, and vegetables, is sold to the local market save for the smaller portion that is consumed by the family. He also works as a driver to supplement his farming income.

Jacob has requested a loan of 50,000 KES from Juhudi Kilimo which he will use to construct a modern dairy unit for his dairy cows. He previously acquired loans of 31,200 KES and 50,000 KES for a dairy cow and poultry business respectively. He remains optimistic that he will be easily able to provide for his family's basic needs.

Jacob says occasional floods and animal diseases lead to huge losses of crops before harvest.

loans.use: To construct a modern dairy unit.

loans.name: Mala

texts.en: Mala is 45 years old. She is married and blessed with one son in Kampong Chhnang Province, Cambodia. She has been running a cosmetics store for more than two years, earning approximately $5 per day. Her husband runs a business of purchasing cattle to resell. He earns about $8 per day. In order to improve her family’s finances, Mala is requesting a loan of $1500 to purchase more cattle to resell. This money will help her husband raise capital in his business and earn more income to support the family. In the future, Mala would like to expand her business and help her son earn a bachelor’s degree. Moreover, she hopes to build a new house as soon as possible.

loans.use: To purchase more cattle to resell

loans.name: Ali

texts.ru: Али трудолюбивый и воспитанный человек, он женат и на воспитании имеет двух дочерей и двух сыновей. Он любит работать на земле и занимается земледелием. В этом бизнесе он уже более четверых лет. В основном он выращивает и продает сельхозкультуры. В основном он сеет кунжут и кукурузу, а также хлопок, так как в Таджикистане есть льготы на хлопководстве. Ему в ведении бизнеса помогают жена и сыновья. Али хотел бы получить займ для покупки минеральных удобрений и горюче- смазочных материалов. Али надеется на вашу помощь и милосердие.
texts.en: Ali is a hardworking and courteous man. He is married and has two daughters and two sons. He is a farmer and loves to work on the land.  He has been in this business for over four years. He generally grows and sells field crops, mostly planting sesame and corn, as well as cotton, since Tajikistan has tax incentives for cotton production. His wife and sons help run the business. Ali would like to obtain a loan to buy mineral fertilizers, fuel, and lubricants. He hopes for your help and generosity.

loans.use: To buy mineral fertilizers, fuel and lubricants

loans.name: Mirzoali

texts.ru: Мирзоали честный и воспитанный человек, ему 47 лет. Он добрый семьянин на воспитании имеет пятерых детей. Супруга является членом дехканского хозяйства. Мирзоали занимается хлопководством. Также он выращивает кукурузу и зерно. Мирзоали хотел бы получить займ для покупки минеральных удобрений и горюче-смазочных материалов. С этой целью он просит вас о помощи.
texts.en: Mirzoali is an honest and courteous man. He is 47 years old and a kind family man with five children. His spouse is a member of a farming cooperative. Mirzoali raises cotton and he also grows corn and grain. He would like to obtain a loan to buy mineral fertilizers, fuel and lubricants. He is asking for your help with this goal.

loans.use: To buy mineral fertilizers, fuel and lubricants

loans.name: Fatima

texts.es:
Fátima ganó un premio en dinero y lo convirtió en una posibilidad permanente de generar ingresos, eso fue lo que hizo cuando le apostó a unos números y ganó sus primer capital de trabajo con el que compró electrodomésticos menores, artículos varios para el hogar como juegos de sabanas, manteles e interiores. Ella desde hace 20 años empezó trabajando en tareas domésticas lavando y planchando y desde hace 7 se vinculó a una cooperativa de oficios varios, en la que aun trabaja, y en la que desde hace 2 años, ha logrado simultáneamente consolidar un mercado entre sus compañeras de trabajo y en las empresa a las que la cooperativa ofrece sus servicios y que le solicitan productos que ella vende a crédito y que sus clientes pagan en plazos ajustados a sus posibilidades.
Fátima conforma un grupo familiar con su esposo y 5 hijos en las edades de 16 a 27 años, con los que sueña ver convertidos en personas exitosas en lo que se propongan. Su mayor anhelo es tener una casa de su propiedad, donde pueda ubicar un pequeño almacén y vender de todo un poco, para que su familia  se sienta confortable y feliz. En la actualidad está aplicando a un credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, con el cual comprará productos que sus clientes le han encargado, entre los que se cuentan planchas, abanicos, sabanas y celulares; su inversión será exitosa porque está fundamentada en la demanda de sus compradores mas rentables y en la capacidad de trabajo que Fátima ha mostrado en todos estos años de experiencia como negociante.
texts.en:
Fatima won some money in a prize, and she converted it into a permanent possibility for generating income.  This was when she made a bet on some numbers and won her first working capital, with which she bought some small home appliances and various other items for the home such as bed sheets, tablecloths and other home furnishings.  Twenty years ago, she worked doing domestic washing and ironing, and seven years ago she joined a cooperative of a variety of trades where she still works.  Over the last 2 years, she has managed to simultaneously consolidate a market among her colleagues and the company to which the cooperative provides its services.  They order products that she sells on credit and her customers pay in installments at terms adjusted to their circumstances.

Fatima belongs to a family group with her husband and 5 children aged 16 to 27, who she dreams of seeing become successful people in whatever they do.  Her main wish is to have her own house where she could put in a small store and sell a little bit of everything.  This way her family would feel comfortable and happy.  She is now applying for a Kiva loan, the first she has taken from the Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, which she will use to buy products that her customers have ordered, including irons, fans, bed linens and cellular phones.  Her investment will be successful because it is based on the demand of her most profitable buyers, and because of the capacity for work that Fatima has demonstrated over all these years as a businesswoman.

loans.use: to buy products that her customers have ordered, including irons, fans, bed linens and cellular phones

loans.name: Francisca Eufemia

texts.es: Francisca vive en el Fortín zona suburbana de Guayaquil. Ella tiene 44 años y de momento está soltera, tiene una niña de 11 años de edad quien estudia en la escuela fiscal del sector. Hace 8 años que vive en el Fortín donde tiene una casa propia de ladrillo y cuenta solo con el servicio de agua y luz. En este sector es normal la falta de servicios ya que es un barrio de asentamientos sin legalización municipal. Francisca nos dice que esta es la única manera de tener un lugar donde vivir por lo que no se queja de sus condiciones. Como es madre soltera necesitaba tener ingresos para la alimentación de sus hijos por eso decido vender ropa de puerta a puerta. Nos comenta que fue duro para ella ya que por ser mujer está expuesta a robos y abusos pero pasando un tiempo aprendió el negocio y hasta hoy no ha tenido mayores problemas. En la actualidad a disminuido sus riesgos vendiendo solo por catalogo productos de belleza y accesorios de mujer, de esta forma solo lleva la mercadería a los cliente que se lo piden. Está satisfecha por sus logros ya que gracias a este negocio a podido sacar adelante a sus hijos y verlos superados.
texts.en:
Francisca lives in the El Fortín suburban area of Guayaquil. She is 44 years old and single at the moment. She has an 11 year-old daughter who is attending the public school in the area.  She has been living in El Fortín for eight years where she has her own brick house and gets only water and lights. The lack of services is normal in this area because it is a squatter settlement without legal authorization. Francisca tells us this is the only way she is able to have a place to live so she cannot complain about the conditions. 

As she is a single mother she needed an income to feed her daughter and consequently decided to sell clothes door to door. She notes that it was difficult for her since being a woman she is vulnerable to robbery and abuse but over time she has learned the business and until now has not had major problems. Currently she has lowered her risks by selling beauty products and women’s accessories by catalog alone. In this way, she only carries merchandise to those customers who order from her. She is satisfied with her accomplishments because, thanks to this business, she has been able to move her child ahead and see her succeed.

loans.use: to purchase perfume, make-up, creams and satchels.

loans.name: Pedro Elias

texts.es: Pedro de 42 años de edad  se dedica a la venta de refrescos  en un lugar del centro de la ciudad de Barranquilla, desde que llegó del departamento del Cesar, hace 17 años,  buscando opciones de paz y bienestar al lado de su familia, conformada por su cónyuge y sus 4 hijos en las edades de  5 a 19 años. En esta ciudad encontró un ambiente propicio para vivir y emprender su propia aventura de negocios, con el cual ha logrado obtener su vivienda y el sostenimiento de su hogar. Cuando se inició como comerciante, lo hizo con una tienda que poco a poco fue ampliando, pero ese negocio lo convirtió en refresquería, debido a que la tienda demandaba mucha operatividad y esfuerzo y disfrutaba muy poco de su familia y el tiempo le ha dado la razón, pues además le ha permitido generar ingresos para que sus hijos logren estudiar y esto para el y su cónyuge es muy importante. En la actualidad está aplicando a un credikiva, octavo financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, con el cual Pedro comprará, refrescos, bebidas nacionales, jugos y cervezas al por mayor y de contado, para provisionarse y tener disponibilidad de inventarios que apacigüen el aumento permanente de los precios de estos productos y esto es la razón por la cual su credikiva se convierte en una inversión de éxito, pues le provee ahorros, por compras a precios especiales por su volumen y se anticipa al alza de los precios de  los artículos que mas vende. Con los financiamientos de la Fundación ha logrado adquirir activos fijos como sus enfriadores y surtir su negocio efectivamente, con lo cual su clientela siempre encuentra lo que necesita y esto le ha convenido porque ha logrado fidelizarlos. Su meta mas adelante es adquirir un local propio y ampliar su mercado para incrementar sus utilidades y en un futuro lograr el cumplimiento de su sueño familiar de bienestar.
texts.en: Pedro is 42 years old. He has sold beverages in a place in the center of the city of Barranquilla since he arrived there from the department of Cesar 17 years ago. He came seeking peace and wellbeing with his family, which consists of his wife and 4 children, aged 5 to 19. In this city he found and environment apt for living and opening his own business venture. With this he has been able to obtain his housing and support for his family. When he started as a merchant, he did it with a store that he grew little by little, but he turned that business into a snack shop, because the store needed more work and he had very little time with his family . Time has proved that he was right, and it has also allowed him to generate income for his chidlren so they can go to school and that is very important for him and his wife. Right now he is applying for a Kiva loan, the eighth loan he has taken out from the  Fundación Mario Santo Domingo. With it Pedro will buy beverages, domestic drinks, juices and beer wholesale and up front in order to stock up and have inventory available. This will guard against the constant price increases of these products and that is the reason his Kiva loan will be a success. It gives him savings to buy a special prices in volume, avoiding the increase in the prices of the items he sells the most. With the loans from the Fundación, he has been able to acquire fixes assets such as his coolers, and stock his business. His customers always find what they want and this is good for him bevause he has gained their loyalty. His goal for the future is to acquire his own locale and expand his merchandise to increase his earnings and in the future fulfill his dream of his family's wellbeing.

loans.use: to buy soft drinks, domestic drinks, juices and beer wholesale.

loans.name: Yarlin Janette

texts.es: Yarlin Janette es una mujer casada, con hijos  esta  emprendedora tiene por  actividad  económica  la venta de mercadería en general. Tiene más de 4 años en su negocio, la cual  realiza de forma ambulante, esta actividad inicio por la necesidad de tener un herramienta de trabajo para ser independiente económicamente y poder ayudar con los gastos de su familia, en la actualidad ha demostrado ser responsable, trabajadora, el financiamiento lo solicita para la compra de cremas corporales, bolsos, calzado, ropa en general, cosméticos, toallas, sabanas, shampoo, tratamientos y otros.
texts.en: Yarlin Janette is a married woman with children who is also an entrepreneur.  She has a business selling general merchandise.  She has had her business for more than 4 years, and she sells her products in an itinerant manner. She started this business because she needed to have a means with which she could be economically independent and also help with her family's expenses.  Now she has demonstrated herself to be responsible and hardworking.  She is requesting a loan to buy body creams, purses, shoes, clothing, cosmetics, towels, bed linens, shampoo, hair treatments and other products.

loans.use: to buy body creams, purses, shoes, clothing, cosmetics, towels, bed linens, shampoo, hair treatments and other products

loans.name: Oeun

texts.en:
Oeun (in the photo), 58 years old, and her husband San, who is 65 years old, are rice farmers. They are old, but they are still strong enough to work. In addition, Oeun also makes On Sorm and sells it in her village when she is not at the farm. On Sorm is a typical Cambodian cake which is made of sticky rice with sweet or salty fillings and is steam-cooked. 

Oeun hopes to expand her farmland; therefore she is applying for a loan in the amount of $1,000 to buy the neighboring land property.

Oeun and San have been married since 1975. They have three children - one son and two daughters. One is married and lives separately, another one is a garment worker and another one is a teacher. The family lives in a village approximately twenty kilometers from Phnom Penh City.

loans.use: To expand her farmland by buying the neighboring land property.

loans.name: Geofry

texts.en:
Geofry is a father of three children aged between eleven and four years and has worked twelve years in active farming in his rural home in Litein, South Rift, Kenya, where he lives with his family. His current production of milk goes to a local cooling plant while his tea is sold to the local market.

Geofry has requested a loan of 40,000 KES from Juhudi Kilimo to buy a chaff cutter, which will help in better feeding of his dairy animals and reduce the waste on the costly feeds significantly. He adds that better feeding for the animals will improve his production capacity and make it easier to provide for his family's basic needs by supplementing the family milk requirement as well as providing income to meet other demands like the education of the children.

He notes that the unreliable weather conditions pose a major challenge to farmers.

loans.use: To buy a chaff cutter.

loans.name: Dolores

texts.en:
Dolores is married with 5 children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Dolores is 46 years old and has 4 children who are in school.

Dolores has a sari-sari store, or variety store, business in the Philippines. She has requested a loan in the amount of 18,000 PHP through NWTF to buy items like shampoo and groceries to sell in her sari-sari store.

Dolores has been in this business for 5 years. In the future, she would like to save enough money so that she can afford to send her children to college and expand her business.

loans.use: to buy items like shampoo and groceries to sell in her sari-sari store.

loans.name: Ngim

texts.en:
Ngim (in the photo) is a widow with five sons and two daughters. Six of her children are married; five live in separate homes and the others live in the family's home. She lives in a village about twenty kilometers South of Phnom Penh City. 

Ngim sells pork. She buys the pork from a Phnom Penh market and transports it on her motorbike to sell in her local market. Unhappily, her motorbike is old and often breaks. She spends lots of money to make the necessary repairs. 

Facing this, Ngim has decided to ask for her second loan in the amount of $1,500 to buy a new motorbike. She will also use a part of the loan to connect her house to private water utility service. By connecting to private water utility service, she will have clean water to use.

loans.use: to buy a new motorbike and connect her house to private water utility service.

loans.name: Malikakhan

texts.ru: Маликахан 51 год, замужем,  имеет 3 детей. Маликахан с 1980 года  занимается животноводством и полеводством.  Начатое со стартовой суммы в 50,000 сом (KGS)  хозяйство  на сегодня приносит около 20,000 сом (KGS) в месяц с продажи молока и риса. В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Маликахан обратилась в компанию «Бай – Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS) на покупку дополнительных голов скота. Доходы Маликахан планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение своего  хозяйства.
texts.en: Malikakhan is 51 years old, married, and has three children. She has been raising livestock and farming since 1980. After starting with 50,000 som (KGS), her business now earns around 20,000 (KGS) each month from the sale of milk and rice. With the goal of further developing her business, Malikakhan approached Bai - Tushum & Partners for a loan of 50,000 som (KGS) to buy additional animals. She plans to invest the profit into further expanding her farm.

loans.use: to purchase cattle

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.en:
Elizabeth is a mother of five adult children and has been in farming for the last eighteen years. Her farm currently produces milk and tea for the local market.

Elizabeth has requested a loan of 50,000 KES from Kiva partner Juhudi Kilimo to buy a dairy cow. She says this will boost her farming business and enable her to enjoy the economies of scale in addition to boosting her financial security and helping her meet her family's basic needs. She adds that the farming business has better prospects in the future.

She notes, however, that weather conditions remain a challenge that must be managed well to avoid huge losses. She appreciates Juhudi Kilimo’s fast loan processing.

loans.use: to buy a dairy cow.

loans.name: An

texts.en:
An (in the photo) is 52 years old and her husband, Khy, is 48 years old. They live in a village about twenty kilometers from Phnom Penh City. They have five children--three sons and two daughters. Two are married and live separately, one has full-time employment, another one is a construction worker, and another is in college. 

An and her husband are rice farmers and they also raise cows at home. An is requesting her first Kiva loan to buy a motorcycle for her son to get to work. Because he does not have his own transportation, he has needed to ride a motorbike with his cousin very often.

loans.use: to buy a motorbike for her son to get to work.

loans.name: Srey Pich

texts.en: Srey Pich is 38 years old. She is a mother of two children and resides with her husband in Takeo Province, Cambodia. She has been involved in weaving for more than ten years, earning approximately $2 per day. Her husband is a security guard who earns about $2 per day. One of her children is employed in a garment factory and earns about $3 per day. In order to improve her business, Srey Pich is requesting a loan of $1000 to purchase silk threads to use in her weaving work. This money will help her expand her business and earn more income to support the family. In the future, she would like to expand her business further and help her youngest child earn a bachelor’s degree.

loans.use: to purchase silk threads to use in her weaving work.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy materials such as metal roofing, purlins, and screws to repair his roof

loans.name: Mwanaidi

texts.en: Mwanaidi is an entrepreneur who has made progress in her goal thanks to her capacity for work and love for her family, which consists of her husband and four children, ranging in ages from 16 to 30 years old. She is the owner of a business, through which she generates income for the family by managing the making and selling of mahamri (dumplings) for breakfast. She began this business two years ago. Little by little Mwanaidi has been able to expand what she offers; she has begun preparing breakfast snacks and now has a domestic market made up of her neighbors, many of whom work with no time for meal preparation. She is asking for a Kiva loan to buy bundles of wheat flour, cooking fat (oil), sugar, and charcoal.  With the help of the loan, she will be able to get substantial discounts by buying in large volume, laying the groundwork for the success of her Kiva loan. This potential has her enthusiastic and dreaming.

loans.use: to buy bundles of wheat flour, cooking fat (oil), sugar, and charcoal.

loans.name: Rakhat

texts.ru: Рахат 40 лет, замужем, воспитывает 3 детей, младшему из которых 3 года. В начале этого года, в поисках источника дохода для своей семьи,  Рахат начала свой бизнес в торговле продуктами питания со стартовой суммой в 28,000 сом (KGS). Благодаря настойчивости  и упорному труду,  Рахат сумела развить свой бизнес  с ежемесячным доходом  в 8,000 сом (KGS). На сегодняшний день ассортимент товаров не представлен в изобилии, и по этой причине Рахат обратилась  в компанию «Бай – Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS).  Доходы от кредита Рахат  планирует вложить в развитие бизнеса.
texts.en: Rakhat is 40 years old, married, and has three children, the youngest of which is 3 years old. Early this year, in search of a source of income for her family, she used a starting sum of 28,000 som (KGS) to open a business selling groceries. Thanks to her persistence and hard work, Rakhat's business now brings in a monthly income of 8,000 som (KGS). Her inventory is currently limited, so Rakhat turned to Bai - Tushum & Partners for a 50,000 som (KGS) loan. Rakhat plans to invest the resulting revenues into development of her business.

loans.use: expand her inventory

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: buy vegetables for resale.

loans.name: Yelithza Solangel

texts.es:
Yelithza es una joven de 21 años, soltera, vive con sus padres en la ciudad de Ica, es una joven estudiante, con muchos deseos de superación y realización que desea sacar adelante a su familia; cuando se encuentra de vacaciones le gusta dedicar su tiempo a trabajar para poder ayudar a sus padres, en algunas ocasiones le gusta engreír a su familia preparando el plato favorito de todos, como es el “Arroz con Pollo”. 
Por iniciativa propia y gracias a su deseo de superación, Yelithza trabaja captando clientes para una empresa de instalaciones de sistemas de seguridad y redes; ella trabaja aproximadamente 9 horas diarias, en las cuales puede atender hasta 45 clientes, ella se encuentra muy a gusto con su trabajo, ya que la consideran mucho por su puntualidad, eficiencia y buena labor. 
Yelithza se encuentra muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra de algunos instrumentos de laboratorio que necesita para realizar sus estudios como técnica farmacéutica, de esta manera podrá realizar sus prácticas en clases y así podrá culminar satisfactoriamente sus estudios, favoreciendo así a lograr su sueño de ser una gran profesional.
texts.en:
Yelithza is a 21 year old youth who is single and lives with her parents in the city of Ica.  She is a young student with a strong desire to excel and achieve who wants to help her family to get ahead.  On school vacations she likes to work to help her parents, and on occasion, she likes to pamper her family by preparing their favorite dish, "arroz con pollo" (chicken and rice). 

On her own initiative, and because of her desire to excel, Yelithza works attracting customers for a business providing security system installation and networks. She works about 9 hours a day, during which time she can attend to about 45 customers.  She is very comfortable with her work, because she is highly regarded for her punctuality, efficiency and good work.

Yelithza is very grateful to the Kiva lenders, because thanks to the help that they have provided, she will be able to purchase some laboratory instruments that she needs for her studies to become a pharmacy technician.  In this way, she will be able to complete her labs and finish her degree. This will support her efforts to achieve her dream to become a great professional.

loans.use: to purchase some laboratory equipment that she needs for her pharmacy studies

loans.name: Sycha

texts.en:
Sychan (pictured above) is 24 years old and her husband, Nit, is 29 years old. They have been married since 2008 and they have just one young daughter. The family lives in a suburb of Phnom Penh. 

Sychan sells sugar cane juice at home in her village. Her husband is a cell phone and walkie talkie repair man. He is hired and gets paid with fees. However, he wants to launch his own business selling and repairing cell phones and walkie talkies. 

Hence, Sychan has decided to ask for a loan of $1,000 to help provide her husband with capital. Sychan’s husband will use the loan to build a shop and buy cell phones, walkie talkies, and materials needed in his business.

loans.use: To launch a cell phone and walkie talkie sales and repair business.

loans.name: Shamshad's Group

texts.en:
Shamshad is married and 40 years of age. She has given birth to three sons and two daughters. Her youngest daughter is still too young to attend to school, while her remaining children are getting their education by attending school nearby. 

Shamshad is a sewing expert. She works for her neighboring clients and earns a reasonable income every month. This income helps her pay her children’s school fees and utility bills. 

Shamshad has applied for a loan from Kiva partner Asasah for further expansion of her husband’s business. He is a fruit seller by profession. With the loan investment, he will buy fresh seasonal fruits that will allow him to make more profits from his business. He has been operating his business for many years, and Shamshad is very hopeful that his business will improve further after investing the loan into it.

loans.use: to buy fruits for her husband's fruit sales business.

loans.name: Thol

texts.en: Thol is 45 years old. She is a mother of five children and resides with her husband in Takeo Province, Cambodia. She has been involved in the agricultural business for more than twenty years, has extensive experience and is successful in her career. She is involved in cultivating rice and fattening up animals. She earns about $3 per day. Her husband helps her run the business. Three of her children are employed in a garment factory. They earn about $12 per day. Due to the difficulty with her family’s transportation, Thol is requesting a loan of $700 to purchase a motorbike to commute. This purchase would enable her to use the money she saves on transportation expenses to support the family. In the future, she would like to run a grocery store and help her youngest child earn a bachelor’s degree. Moreover, she hopes to rebuild her present house to make it more comfortable for her family.

loans.use: To purchase a motorbike to commute

loans.name: Zarema

texts.ru: Зарема  – лидер группы «Мырза», объединяющей еще 3 женщин – участниц.  Зареме 27 лет, замужем,  имеет 2 детей. Зарема работает медсестрой  в  больнице села  1-Мая и в качестве  дополнительного источника дохода для семьи, с 2010 года  занимается животноводством и полеводством.  Начатое со стартовой суммы в 10,000 сом (KGS)  хозяйство  на сегодня насчитывает 4 коровы, 1 лошадь,16 овец и приносит около 5,000 сом (KGS) в месяц с продажи молока и молочных продуктов. В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Зарема обратилась в компанию «Бай – Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 60,000 сом (KGS) на покупку дополнительных голов скота. Доходы Зарема планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение своего  хозяйства.
texts.en: Zarema is the leader of the Myrza group, which includes three other women participants. Zarema is 27 years old, married, and has two children. She is a nurse in the hospital of the village May 1st. To earn additional income for her family Zarema has been raising livestock and farming since 2010. She began with a starting capital of 10,000 som (KGS), and today her farm includes four cows, one horse, and 16 sheep, and earns around 5,000 som (KGS) per month from the sales of milk and dairy products. In order to further develop her business, Zarema came to Bai Tushum & Partners for a 60,000 som (KGS) loan to buy additional livestock. Zarema plans to invest the resulting revenues into expanding her farm.

loans.use: to purchase livestock

loans.name: Mercedes

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “VIRGEN GUADALUPE-CUSCO”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Mercedes; la socia continua con su negocio de libreria ella vende diferentes tipos de mercaderia como cuadernos,lapiceros,hojas entre otros,la socia trabaja desde las 09:00am hasta hasta las 08:00p.m aproximadamente,la socia es una persona empeñosa y responsable siendo de esta manera que la socia saca adelante a su familia.

La socia solicita el préstamo para la compra de insumos para su hogar como arroz y azucar.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Mercedes belongs to the communal bank “VIRGEN GUADALUPE-CUSCO."  This bank is located in the district of Cusco, which is part of the province and department of Cusco.

This is Mercedes.  She is continuing with her stationery store where she sells all types of items including: notebooks, pencils, paper, and other items.  She works from about 9am until 8pm.  She is a hardworking and responsible person who, in this way, provides for her family.

Mercedes is requesting a loan to buy supplies for her household, including rice and sugar.

She is happy to be getting this loan, and she promises to comply with the payment terms.

loans.use: to buy supplies for her household such as rice and sugar

loans.name: Edis

texts.es: El trabajo persistente de Edis y su cónyuge lo realizan diariamente para lograr poco a poco construir opciones de éxito futuro para su hijo, hoy en la edad de 10 años. Ellos tienen un negocio de venta de comidas rápidas y refrescos, ubicado en un corredor de mucha actividad peatonal, donde ofrecen al público perros calientes, hamburguesas, salchichas y papas fritas, asados y combinaciones de estas acompañadas de gaseosas, te u otras bebidas frías, que su clientela pide de acuerdo al gusto de cada uno de ellos. Su trabajo lo realizan de lunes a jueves desde las 4:00 p.m hasta las 12:00.m. y de viernes a domingo desde las 4:00 p.m hasta las 2:00 a.m. ; aunque la competencia es muy alta, el negocio de Edis se sostiene por la calidad de sus productos, los precios competitivos y atención esmerada que profesan a sus clientes. En este negocio trabajan Edis, su cónyuge y un empleado. Su meta mas adelante es lograr instalaciones locativas de excelencia y poco a poco se prepara con su esposo para ello. En la actualidad está aplicando a un credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, con el cual comprará de contado y en mayor volumen,  insumos para las comidas rápidas, como salsas y refrescos, pues necesita estar provisionada para la época de mayor movimiento en sus venta, en el mes de Junio que trae las vacaciones escolares y con ello el aumento del número de compradores que son los niños y jóvenes. Su sueño es tener su propia casa y por eso cualquier esfuerzo que realice trabajando, está dirigido a producir cada vez más ingresos, con el fin de alcanzarlo.
texts.en: Edis and her husband work every day to offer their 10 year old son a better future. They have a fast food business that is located in a corridor with lots of pedestrians and sell beverages as well. They sell hot dogs, hamburgers, sausages with french fries, and combinations of these items with sodas, tea, or other beverages depending on their client’s preference.They work from Monday to Thursday from 4pm to 12am and Friday to Sunday work from 4pm to 2am. Even though competition is very high, her business is strong because she provides quality products, at reasonable prices, and offers excellent service. She, her husband, and another employee work in the restaurant. In the future, she plans on establishing excellent locales and help her husband prepare little by little. At the moment, she is requesting Kiva and the Mario Santo Domingo Foundation a loan. She will buy wholesale products, materials for preparing fast food, such as salsas and sodas since she must be stocked during the busiest time in June. Since the children finish classes for the summer she has an increase of younger clients. Her dream is to own her own home which is why every effort she puts into her work is to yield more profits to make her dream come true.

loans.use: buy wholesale products, materials for preparing fast food such as salsas and sodas

loans.name: Lay Sim

texts.en:
Lay Sim is 27 years old. She is single and resides with her parents and brother in Takeo Province, Cambodia. She has been working in a garment factory for more than 4 years, earning approximately $4 per day. Her brother is a construction worker who earns about $5 per day. 

Due to a lack of funds, Lay Sim is requesting a loan of $1,300 to purchase a timber house to rebuild on her own land. This purchase would enable her to provide better living conditions for her family. In the future, Lay Sim would like to run a small pig farm in order to generate more income to support the family.

loans.use: to purchase a timber house to rebuild on her own land.

loans.name: Nurgul

texts.ru: Нургул  – участница группы «Мырза», ей  51 год, замужем, мать 3 детей. В качестве  источника дохода для семьи, Нургул занимается животноводством.  Имея в хозяйстве 2 дойные коровы, Нургул имеет ежемесячную прибыль в сумме 3,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Нургул обратилась в компанию «Бай – Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 60,000 сом (KGS) на покупку дойной коровы. Доходы Нургул планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение своего  хозяйства.
texts.en: Nurgul is a member of the Myrza group. She is 51 years old, married, and has three children. Nurgul raises livestock to provide income for her family. With two milk cows she earns a monthly income of 3,000 som (KGS). In order to further develop her business Nurgul came to Bai Tushum and Partners for a 60,000 som (KGS) loan for the purchase of a milk cow. She plans to invest the profits into further expanding her herd.

loans.use: to purchase cattle

loans.name: Amadou

texts.fr: Monsieur Amadou habite au Sénégal. Il est marié et Il est livreur et en meme temps  pratique le commerce de bombonnes de gaz. Ses activités sont concentrées entre 5heures du matin et 15 heures. Il capitalise une expérience de 9 ans dans la vente des bouteilles de gaz. Il est membre d’un guichet de l’U-IMCEC ou il a déjà remboursé 2 crédits antérieurs. Il sollicite un crédit de 100 000 frs prévu pour l’achat de bouteilles de gaz pour ainsi  renforcer  son stock. Son ambition est d’acquérir son propre magasin de livraison de gaz. Ce financement lui permettra de trouver un employé qui pourra le seconder dans son activité, d’accroitre  ses revenus en vue de faire face aux  frais scolaires des enfants et d’épargner de l’argent.
texts.en:
Monsieur Amadou is married and lives in Senegal. He is a deliveryman who also sells bottles of gas. He works between 5 am and 3 pm. He has been selling bottles of gas for 9 years. 

He is a member of a U-IMCEC branch office where he has already repaid 2 previous loans. He's asking for a loan of 100,000 frs, which he'll use to buy bottles of gas to reinforce his stock. His goal is to open his own gas delivery store. 

This financing will allow him to find an employee who can help him with his business and to increase his revenue in order to pay for his children's school fees and save money.

loans.use: to buy bottles of gas for resale.

loans.name: Jose Santos

texts.es:
Jose, tiene 37 años de edad, está casado y tiene 3 hijos, vive con su familia en una aldea del municipio de Gracias, Lempira.
Jose siempre se ha dedicado a la agricultura, comenzó realizando trabajos de jornalero, ya hace 20 años que trabaja con sus propios cultivos, el cultiva maíz y frijoles, esta producción la vende en el mercado local. Eventualmente realiza trabajos de albañilería donde obtiene otros ingresos. Ha solicitado varios préstamos a ODEF, actualmente solicita el quinto préstamo con el cual va comprar fertilizantes y va cubrir gastos de limpieza del cultivo de maíz. Con esta asistencia espera sacar buenas cosechas para incrementar las ventas y los ingresos que le ayudaran a darle un mejor nivel de vida a su familia.
texts.en:
Jose is 37 years old.  He is married with three children, and lives with his family in a village in the municipality of Gracias, in Lempira.

Jose has always worked in agriculture.  He started by working as a day-laborer, and for the last 20 years he has been working with his own crops.  He grows corn and beans, and sells his production in the local market.  Eventually he started doing some work in construction, from where he gets additional income.

He has requested several loans from ODEF.  He is currently requesting his fifth loan, with which he will purchase fertilizers and cover his costs for clearing his fields for corn-growing.  With this assistance he hopes to be able to achieve good harvests to increase his sales and income, which will help him to provide his family with a better standard of living.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers and cover his costs for clearing his fields for corn-growing.

loans.name: Shaiyrkul

texts.ru: Шайыркул  –участница группы «Мырза», ей 34 года, воспитывает 3 детей. В качестве  источника дохода для семьи, Шайыркул занимается животноводством.  Имея в хозяйстве 1 дойную корову, 3 овец и 1 жеребенка,  Шайыркул  имеет ежемесячную прибыль в сумме приблизительно 2,000 сом (KGS) с продажи молока. В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса за счет полеводства, Шайыркул обратилась в компанию «Бай – Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 30,000 сом (KGS) на покупку семян картофеля для посадки на участке в 10 соток. Доходы Шайыркул планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение своего  хозяйства.
texts.en: Shaiyrkul is part of the Myrza group. She is 34 years old and has three children. Shaiyrkul raises livestock as a source of income for her family. With 1 milk cow, three sheep, and a foal, Shaiyrkul earns a monthly profit of approximately 2,000 som (KGS) from selling milk. With the goal of further developing her business into raising crops, Shaiyrkul came to Bai Tushum and Partners for a 30,000 som (KGS) loan to buy seed potatoes to plant on a 1/4 acre parcel.  She plants to invest her earnings into further expansion of her business.

loans.use: to purchase seed

loans.name: Luz Targelia

texts.es:
Luz es una mujer de 67 años que es casada y vive junto a su esposo en la parroquia de "Abrahan Calazacon" del cantón "Santo Domingo". Santo Domingo de los Colorados es una de las ciudades más jóvenes del Ecuador, actualmente se ha constituido en el punto de enlace entre las región Sierra y Costa. Es un sitio privilegiado, no solo por la riqueza étnica, sino también por los paisajes inusitados que se pueden encontrar desde el ingreso mismo a esta bella ciudad. Santo Domingo de los Colorados pertenece actualmente a la provincia de Santo Domingo de los Tsáchilas, recientemente conformada.  La fiesta principal de Santo Domingo, se celebra con un movimiento intenso de visitantes, intercambio comercial y cultural. Una gran feria tiene lugar en las instalaciones de la Asociación de Ganaderos, allí se muestran y compiten los mejores ejemplares de las distintas razas y cruces que son criados en las haciendas de la región. 

Luz desde hace 12 años tiene una tienda de abarrotes, la misma que está ubicada cerca de un subcentro de salud de la parroquia. Durante este tiempo ha ido creciendo, pero la falta de capital es uno de los principales obstáculos que ha sabido superar. Quiere capitalizar e invertir en su negocio. Tiene aún espacio en las perchas de exhibición por lo que desea comprar un poco más de mercadería e invertir en los productos de primera necesidad como lo son arroz y azúcar los cuales comprando en cantidad podrá tener un mejor precio.

A pesar de únicamente haber cursado la educación primaria ella ha sabido salir adelante como microempresaria y sustentar a su familia. Ella a pesar de su edad lucha por cumplir su sueño de tener un micromercado moderno y surtido.
texts.en:
Luz is a woman of 67 who is married and lives with her husband in the Abrahan Calazacon parish of the Santo Domingo canton. Santo Domingo de los Colorados is one of the youngest cities in Ecuador. Now it constitutes the focal point between the mountain region and the coast. It is a privileged site, not only for its aesthetic richness but also for its unusual scenery, which can be found at the very entrance to this beautiful city. Santo Domingo de los Colorados now belongs to the province of Santo Domingo de los Tsáchilas, which was recently formed. The principal holiday in Santo Domingo is celebrated with an intense influx of visitors and commercial and cultural exchanges. A great fair takes place at the Livestock Raisers Association. There the best examples of the distinct breeds and cross-breeds that are raised on the ranches of the region are exhibited and compete.

Luz has had a grocery store for 12 years. It is located near a parish sub-center for health. Her business has been growing during this time, but the lack of capital is one of the principal obstacles that she has been able to overcome. She wants to capitalize and invest in her business. She still has space on the display shelves, so she wants to buy a little more merchandise and invest in basic necessities such as rice and sugar, for which she will get a better price by buying in quantity.

In spite of having only a primary education, she has been able to advance as a micro-entrepreneur and sustain her family. In spite of her age, she strives to accomplish her dream of having a modern, stocked micro-market.

loans.use: to buy merchandise for her store

loans.name: Segundina

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “VIRGEN GUADALUPE-CUSCO”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Segundina; La socia continua trabajando en su negocio de restaurante ella prepara desayunos y almuerzos, la socia trabaja desde las 7:00 a.m hasta las 9:00 p.m aproximadamente, la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa siendo de esta manera que la socia saca adelante a su familia.

La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar insumos para su negocio como arroz y aceite.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the communal bank “VIRGEN GUADALUPE-Cusco.” The bank is located in the district of Cusco, Cusco province, and Cusco department.

She is named Mrs. Segundina; She still works in her restaurant preparing breakfasts and lunches. She works from 7am to 9pm. She is a responsible and hardworking woman and was able to provide for her family.

She is requesting the loan to buy materials such as rice and oil.

She is happy for the loan and will pay it back punctually.

loans.use: buy materials such as rice and oil

loans.name: Clarinda

texts.es:
Clarinda tiene 58 años de edad, es madre soltera, vive con su hijo y una nieta en el Municipio de Choloma, Cortes.
Clarinda tiene un negocio de venta de comida, este negocio lo estableció hace 25 años el cual ha sido su fuente de ingresos para sobrevivir porque no cuenta con el apoyo del padre de sus hijos.  Ella vende variedad de alimentos como pollo frito con tajadas, carne molida con tajadas, pastelitos rellenos de carne, arroz y papa, tacos rellenos de pollo, pupusas  (hechas de maíz rellenas de quesillo o chicharrón) y refrescos. Así se gana la vida trabajando todos los días para atender las necesidades del  los clientes.
Doña Clarinda ha solicitado su tercer préstamo con ODEF de 15,000 lempiras para abastecerse de insumos necesarios para la elaboración de los alimentos que ofrece como, carnes, verduras, bananos,  condimentos, refrescos etc.  Ella  para incrementar su ingreso necesita ofrecer variedad de alimentos a los clientes y por eso decidió hacer esta inversión.
La meta es salir adelante en su negocio manteniéndolo siempre activo para  tener una mejor vida  satisfaciendo las necesidades de su  hogar.
texts.en:
Clarinda is 58 years old.  She is a single mother and lives with her son and granddaughter in the municipality of Choloma in Cortes.

Clarinda has a business selling food.  She established this business 25 years ago, and it has been her source of income for survival, as she gets no support from the father of her children.  She sells a variety of food such as fried chicken with fried plantains; ground chicken with fried plantains; pastries stuffed with meat, rice and potato; chicken tacos; pupusas (made of corn and filled with cheese or pork crackling) and sodas.  In this way she earns her living, working every day tending to her customers' needs.

Doña Clarinda has requested her third loan through ODEF for 15,000 lempiras, in order to stock up on necessary supplies for making the food she sells.  For example, meat, vegetables, bananas, spices, sodas, etc.  In order to increase her income, she needs to offer a variety of food for sale to her customers, and this is why she decided to make this investment.

Her goal is to move ahead of life with her business, always keeping it active, so as to have a better life which will meet her household's needs.

loans.use: to purchase meat, vegetables, bananas, spices, sodas, etc. for making food for sale.

loans.name: Ubaldina

texts.es: La socia Ubaldina nació en el distrito de Lucre de la provincia de Quispicanchi del departamento del Cusco, tiene 68 años de edad y es casada y fruto de esta hermosa relación tiene ocho hijos. La socia Ubaldina se dedica a la venta de carne, papa, chuño,  haba verde, moraya y queso. La socia Ubaldina lleva verduras a la ciudad de Huancarani y cuando regresa de esa ciudad trae mercadería como por ejemplo queso, carne, y otras cosas más. La socia Ubaldina en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar mercadería como por ejemplo verduras como por ejemplo cebollas, tomates y otras cosas más. Ya son varios años que se dedica a la venta  verduras y le va muy bien. La socia Ubaldina pertenece al banco comunal “Señor de Qoyllority de Lucre” de la Asociación Arariwa de la ciudad del Cusco.
texts.en: Member Ubaldina from the Lucre district, Quispicanchi province, Cusco department is 61 years old, married, and has eight children. For living she sells meat, potatoes, potato flour, green beans, stew, and cheese. She takes vegetables to Huancarani city and when she returns from the city she brings back products such as cheese, meets, and other things. She will use the loan to buy vegetables such as onions, tomatoes, etc. She has been selling vegetables for many years and it is going very well. She belongs communal bank “Mrs. Qoyllority of Lucre” of the Arariwa Association in Cusco city.

loans.use: buy vegetables such as onions, tomatoes, etc

loans.name: Fernando

texts.en:
Fernando is an artisan who specializes in alpaca apparel. He would like to invest in the bulk purchase of raw materials for production, including pure alpaca wool in five different colors to prepare for the next busy winter selling season.

Fernando has been selling through NOVICA since 2011. This is his story:

Fernando was introduced to textiles by his uncles. He says, "My artistic origins come from my family. My uncles worked in textiles and little by little they introduced me to this world. I love being able to translate materials into beautiful products. My work means everything to me: it's what I love and cherish, and I love the fact that it allows me to provide for my family. I consider myself a happy person and every day I strive to get ahead, not only in work, but also as a human being, a husband, and a son."

"I am proud to be an artisan, and I am proud to have been born in a land such as Peru that is so rich in culture and tradition. It is here where alpacas are bred, and their fleece has been used since the days of our Inca ancestors to make clothes. Today I have the opportunity to preserve this custom by designing apparel. On top of that, this great door has been opened for us to show customers around the world this rich tradition of ours. Thank you for appreciating what is ours, and for your support in helping me grow my business with this interest-free microcredit. I could not have found a better path to follow in life!"

loans.use: to purchase alpaca wool and other materials in bulk

loans.name: Zhomi

texts.ru: Жоми добросовестный человек, он женат и на воспитании имеет пятерых детей. Он и его жена стараются улучшить жилищные условия, чтобы воспитывать своих детей в хороших условиях. На иждивении имеют двоих. Жоми занимается выращиванием и  продажей картофеля. Имеет плодовые деревья граната, которые дают хорошие плоды. Также Жоми выращивает саженцы и продает на рынке. В основном в бизнесе помогают его дружная семья, его брат, жена и дочки. Жоми хотел бы получить займ для покупки минеральных удобрений для обработки земли.
texts.en: Zhomi is a conscientious man. He is married and has five children. He and his wife are trying to improve their housing conditions so that they can bring up their children in a good environment. They have two dependents. Zhomi grows and sells potatoes. He has pomegranate trees which yield good fruit. Zhomi also grows transplants and sells them at the market. His brother, wife, daughters, and a close family generally help with the business. He would like to procure a loan to buy mineral fertilizers to amend the soil.

loans.use: To buy mineral fertilizers

loans.name: Minvojidin

texts.ru: Минводжидин является  трудолюбивым и воспитанным человекам, содержащей большую семью. На воспитании имеет семерых детей. Жена работает в дехканском хозяйстве, Минводжидин также работает в дехканском хозяйстве и выращивает сельхозпродуктов, арбуз, кукурузу на зерно. Данный момент он посеял на 6 гектарах земли хлопок, на 2-х гектарах арбуз, на 1 гектаре кукурузу на зерно и еще на 1 гектаре посеял подсолнух. Минводжидин хотел бы получить займ для покупки минеральных удобрений и оплаты услуги трактора. Он надеется на вашу помощь и доброту.
texts.en: Minvojidin is a hard working and courteous man, and he supports a large family. He has seven children. His wife works for a farming cooperative. Minvojidin also works with a farming cooperative and grows crops, watermelon and feed corn. Currently he has 6 hectares in cotton planted, two hectares in watermelon, one hectare in feed corn, and another hectare in sunflowers. Minvojidin would like to obtain a loan to buy mineral fertilizers and pay for tractor services. He hopes for your help and kindness.

loans.use: To buy mineral fertilizers

loans.name: Fermin

texts.es: Fermín, tiene la edad  de 45 años, está casado,  vive con sus tres hijos y la esposa  actualmente. El con el crédito pretende comprar insumos como abonos y fumigaciones  y ayudarse con la mano de obra. El tiene pensado comprar todos estos insumos y además una bomba  para fumigar el café de una forma más rápida y efectiva y un mejor rendimiento del producto y con ello poder mantener  en excelente condiciones la plantación y así poder generar más ganancias  y obtener una mejor calidad de vida y una estabilidad económica. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en: Fermín in 45 years old, married, and lives with his wife and three children. He will use the loan to buy materials such as fertilizer, fumigations, and labor. He not only wants by these materials for his crops but he also wants to buy a bug bomb for his café. That way he can maintain his crops in excellent conditions to increase income and have a better quality life, and establish economic stability. This will be his first loan with FUDECOSUR. He never had prior loans with state banks however FUDECOSUR offered him a loan with ease and with a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: buy cultivation materials and a bug bomb

loans.name: Martha

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “VIRGEN GUADALUPE-CUSCO”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Martha;La socia continua trabajando en su negocio de compra y venta de ropa, ella vende pantalones,chompas,casacas,polos entre otros,la socia vende su mercaderia en un stand que se encuentra ubicado por el centro de la ciudad,la socia desea poder agrandar su negocio,la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa,siendo de esta manera que la socia saca adelante a su familia.

La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar mas mercaderia de ropa como casacas.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the communal bank “VIRGEN-GUADALUPE-CUSCO.” It is located in the Cusco district, province, and department.

This member is Martha. She still sell clothes for living. She sells pants, sweaters, jackets, polos and other items of clothing. She sells merchandise in a stand located in the center of the city. She would like to grow her business. She is a responsible and hard-working person as she provided for her family’s well-being.

She will us the loan to buy clothing such as jackets.

She is happy for the loan and will pay it back in the punctual manner

loans.use: buy clothing such as jackets

loans.name: Juma

texts.en:
Juma lives in Tiribe, Mombasa. He works everyday, because his dream is to have a store that is well-known in his town. In order to do this, he sells charcoal to his retailers at wholesale. By doing so, he has managed to save and invest in another business, that of rearing poultry chicks for resale to restaurant operators in the area. This has provided him with the opportunity to generate new income. Meanwhile, Juma can earn extra money. 

The lack of working capital in the face of Juma’s dreams is his biggest challenge. This is why he has turned to Kiva credit and his first loan with Yehu Microfinance Trust. With his Kiva credit, Juma will buy sacks of charcoal which are in high demand during this rainy season and due to the high cost of purchasing fuel. His loan should be successful, because his sales are based on customer orders. What he buys has a fast turnover, allowing his working capital to turn quickly and therefore increasing his profits. Choosing good customers would increase the recovery of his capital and thereby increase his earnings.

loans.use: to buy sacks of charcoal for resale.

loans.name: Azizullo

texts.ru: За последние 5 лет Азизулло занимается выращиванием гороха и клевера. Имеет плодовые деревья граната, которые приносят хороший урожай. Азизулло женат и любящий отец двоих дочерей и одного сына. Его жена трудолюбивая женщина и помогает мужу в обработке земли и посева семян. Азизулло запрашивает займ для покупки минеральных удобрений с целью повышения урожайности земли. Он и его жена надеются на вашу помощь и щедрость.
texts.en: Azizullo has grown peas and clover for the past five years. He has pomegranate trees which yield well. Azizullo is married and is the loving father of two daughters and a son. His wife is a hardworking woman and she helps her husband cultivate the land and plant seeds. Azizullo is asking for a loan to buy mineral fertilizers in order to improve the land's productivity. He and his wife hope for your help and generosity.

loans.use: To buy mineral fertilizers

loans.name: Gisela

texts.es:
Gisela es una mujer de 26 años, vive en la ciudad de Pucallpa con sus 2 pequeños hijos, lastimosamente por diversas circunstancias se separó de su pareja; ella es una mujer muy empeñosa y trabajadora que ha podido superar las adversidades que se le han presentado en la vida, en sus ratos libres le gusta asistir a la iglesia a la que pertenece para agradecer a Dios por sus bendiciones y en algunas ocasiones engríe a sus pequeños preparando un rico Arroz Chaufa, plato preferido por ellos; lamentablemente Gisela no pudo culminar sus estudios primarios debido a que tuvo que trabajar desde muy joven, pero ella siempre quiso estudiar la carrera de Ingeniería Mecánica.
Gracias a su deseo de salir adelante y por iniciativa propia, Gisela trabaja en su negocio de vulcanizado de motos y motokar, ella dedica a su negocio un aproximado de 14 horas diarias, en las cuales puedeatender entre 15 clientes o más, adicionalmente para obtener más ingresos, Gisela alquila 3 motokars que son de su propiedad; ella cree que su negocio marcha bien debido al servicio y buena atención que brinda a sus clientes.       
Gisela se encuentra muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar el remodelado de su taller de vulcanizado, ella desea poder pintar las paredes y comprar sillas para que sus clientes tomen asiento mientras esperan ser atendidos; de esta manera Gisela podrá ganar más clientela e incrementar sus ingresos económicos, ya que poco a poco con dichas ganancias espera poder tener un negocio propio de distribución de repuestos de vehículos menores y así podría asegurar el futuro y bienestar de sus pequeños hijos.
texts.en:
Gisela is 26 years old. She lives in the city of Pucallpa with her two young children. Sadly for various reasons, she is separated from her partner. She is a very hard working woman who has managed to overcome the adversities that life has presented her. In her free time, she likes to attend the church she belongs to in order to thank God for his blessings. Sometimes, she spoils her children by preparing their favorite dish, arroz chaufa. Unfortunately, Gisela could not finish her studies because she has had to work from a very young age but she always wanted to study mechanical engineering. 
Thanks to her desire to move forward and through her own initiative, Gisela works in her business repairing engines and motokars (small vehicles). She works for approximately 14 hours every day.
