She can help 15 or more customers. In addition, in order to earn more income, Gisela rents three motokars that belong to her. She believes her business is going well due to the service and good attention offered to her customers. 
Gisela is very grateful for the Kiva loans. Thanks to the help offered, she will be able to remodel her tire repair workshop. She wants to paint the walls and purchase chairs so that her customers can take a seat while waiting for service. With these changes, Gisela can gain more customers and increase her earnings. Little by little, with these earnings, she hopes to have her own small vehicle spare parts business. With this, she can secure the future and well-being of her young children.

loans.use: remodel her tire repair shop.

loans.name: Florinda

texts.es:
Florinda es una mujer de 47 años, vive en la ciudad de Ica, es madre soltera, tiene 3 hijos por los cuales siempre ha luchado y superado las adversidades que se le presentaron en la vida, en la actualidad sus hijos se encuentran muy agradecidos con Florinda por sus grandes esfuerzos y empeño por sacarlos adelante, ahora sus hijos ya son mayores e independientes; en sus ratos libres le gusta visitar a sus hijos y en algunas ocasiones prepara el plato favorito de todos sus hijos como es el riquísimo “Lomo Saltado”.
Gracias al apoyo de sus hijos y a sus ganas de seguir adelante, Florinda tiene un puesto de ventas de periódicos al que dedica a su negocio un aproximado de 9 horas diarias, ella no solo trabaja en su puesto, sino también reparte y hace entregas de sus periódicos cuando sus clientes lo solicitan; ella cree que su negocio marcha bien debido a que tiene buena acogida con sus clientes taxistas y choferes de microbuses, así como por su carisma y buena atención. 
Florinda se encuentra muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra de un módulo de ventas más pequeño del que tiene, así también utilizará la ayuda para realizar los pagos de los trámites de posesión del lugar donde vende sus periódicos; de esta manera Florinda incrementará sus ingresos y más adelante espera poder expandir su negocio aperturando otro stand de venta de periódicos, libros y revistas en otra zona de la ciudad, para que así en un futuro no muy lejano espera poder terminar de construir totalmente su casa.
texts.en:
Florinda is a 47-year-old woman who lives in the city of Ica. She is a single mother with three children, so she always strives to overcome the adversities she faces in her life. Now that her children and grown and independent, they say that they are very grateful that Florinda has put forth great strength and effort into helping them get ahead. In her free time, Florinda likes to visit with her children and occasionally prepares their favorite dish, the flavorful “lomo saltado” (Peruvian beef stir-fry).

Thanks to the support from her children and her desire to press forward, Florinda has a newsstand where she works at approximately nine hours each day. She manages her stand by herself. Florinda also distributes and delivers newspapers whenever her customers request them. She believes her business is doing well because she is well-received among her customers, which include taxi drivers and bus drivers. She is also recognized for her charisma and good service.

Florinda is grateful to the Kiva lenders. Thanks to the assistance they have provided, she will be able to buy a modular display rack that is smaller than the one she currently has. Her loan will also be used to pay the delivery cost of having the newspapers shipped from the place that sells them. This will help Florinda increase her earnings and get ahead. She hopes to expand her business by opening another newsstand in another part of the city where she can also sell books and magazines. In the not-so-distant future, she hopes to have the construction of her house completely finished.

loans.use: to buy a modular display rack and to pay the shipping costs of her newspapers.

loans.name: Soda

texts.en:
Soda (in the photo) is 23 years old and his wife, Srey Leap, is a garment worker. They live in a village about 20 kilometers from Phnom Penh City. Soda has been married but he has no children yet.    

Soda is a fisherman and farmer. He operates a farming business which he had invested in with his brother. He now hopes to run his own business. That is why he decides to apply for a loan in the amount of $1,000.  He will use the loan to purchase a boat, a boat motor, and fishing materials.

loans.use: To purchase a boat, a boat motor, and fishing materials.

loans.name: G.s. Unidas En Cristo Group

texts.es: El Grupo Solidario Unidas en Cristo está conformado por santos Juana, maría auciliadora estas  emprendedoras  tienen por actividad económica la venta de ropa usada desde hace varios años que se dedican a dicha actividad lo cual tiene muy buena experiencia, ellas iniciaron el negocio con un poco de capital propio, pero gracias al apoyo que fundación le ha brindado han crecido en el mercado invirtiendo en mejoras de pacas de ropa. Están solicitando el crédito para las compra de paca de buenas calidad ropa de niño, jóvenes, adultos.
texts.en: The communal bank Unidas en Cristo (United in Christ) is formed by Santos Juana and Maria Auxiliadora. The business activity of these entrepreneurs is the sale of used clothing. They have been working in this business for a number of years, so they have very good experience in it. They began the business with a little of their own capital, but thanks to the support that the foundation has offered them, they have grown in the market, investing in larger bundles of clothing. They are applying for a loan to purchase bundles of good quality clothing for children, youth, and adults.

loans.use: to buy bales of good quality clothing for children, youth, and adults

loans.name: Alvaro

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “VIRGEN GUADALUPE-CUSCO”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Alvaro;El socio continua brindando el servicio de taxi , el socio trabaja todos los dias desde las 05:00am hasta las 10:00pm aproximadamente, el socio es una persona responsable y empeñosa con muchas ganas de continuar trabajando por su familia.

El  socio solicita el préstamo para la compra de llantas para su auto.

El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Sr. Alvaro is a member of the Communal Bank "Virgen Guadalupe-Cusco", which is located in the District, Province, and Department of Cusco.

He continues to provide taxi services and works every day from 5am to approximately 10pm. Alvaro is a responsible and industrious person who has the willingness to continue working on behalf of his family. The loan he is requesting will be used to buy tires for his automobile.

He is pleased with the loan and promises to complete his payments.

loans.use: to buy tires for his vehicle.

loans.name: Sandra Janneth

texts.es:
Sandra tiene 40 años de edad, es casada y vive con su esposo y sus dos hijos en una colonia ubicada en el sector López Arellano del municipio de Choloma.
La actividad de negocio que realiza es venta de golosinas como: churros, dulces, galletas y naranjas. Esta actividad la realiza en su casa desde hace 4 años y la ha mantenido estable mediante la inversión de varios préstamos que a solicitado. Siempre le ha  gustado el comercio  anteriormente vendía mercadería en general.  Actualmente solicita el sexto préstamo que es de 8,000.00 Lempiras para seguir surtiendo el negocio de golosinas y otros productos para la venta. Ella espera tener un incremento en sus ventas y con las ganancias va lograr poco a poco que su familia tenga una mejor condición de vida.
texts.en:
Sandra is 40 years old, married, and lives with her husband and two children in a subdivision in the López Arellano sector of the town of Choloma. She has a business selling snacks such as donuts, candy, cookies, and oranges. Sandra established this business at her house four years ago and has managed to keep it stable by investing the various loans she requested. She has always enjoyed the retail trade since she previously sold general merchandise.

At the moment, Sandra is requesting her sixth loan in the amount of 8,000 HNL so that she can restock her business with snacks and other products to sell. She hopes to have an increase in her sales and profits so that she can gradually provide her family with better living conditions.

loans.use: to buy donuts, candy, cookies, oranges, and other snack foods.

loans.name: Rica

texts.en:
This is Rica, 28, a resident of Dasmarinas, Cavite, Philippines. She is married to Nicanor, a sewer. She, together with her husband, manages their household while operating their businesses. At this time, she is working hard to continually provide income for their everyday expenses.  

Rica operates a food stall. She sells snacks like fruits, juices, burgers and other street food staples that she sells in their community. Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community.  She earns a minimum of PHP 300 in sales every day.

To help her continue operations of her business, she is requesting a PHP 8,000 loan. She will be using the loan to buy more quantities of raw products and supplies she uses in her business. She expects a boost in her business income as she expands her business.  

Rica dreams of being able to give her family a good future through all her hard work in her business. She faithfully meets up with her co-fellowship members to share stories of her work every week and draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: To pay for raw ingredients and supplies

loans.name: Merla

texts.en: Merla is a married woman who is 40 years old. She lives in Campo 5, Ramon Magsaysay, Zamboanga del Sur, Philippines. Merla used her last loan to purchase additional stock of goods to sell. Her business has grown and become successful. Now she's taking a new loan to purchase additional products like canned goods, noodles, sugar and coffee. Positively, she hopes to be able to grow her business even more.

loans.use: to purchase additional products like canned goods, noodles, sugar and coffee

location.town: Campo 5, Ramon Magsaysay, Zamboanga Del Sur

loans.name: Shama's Group

texts.en:
Shama has requested a loan from Kiva partner Asasah for her husband’s business who is a mason by profession. With the loan funds, he will buy masonry tools which will help him in his work. He is an experienced mason. Shama herself is also a very hardworking person. She operates a sewing business at her home to supplement the income of her family.  
She is hopeful that her husband will be enabled to perform much better work for his clients and thus generate good income for the family.

loans.use: To buy masonry tools

loans.name: Neli

texts.es: La socia Neli nació en el distrito de Lucre de la provincia de Quispicanchi del departamento del Cusco, tiene 30 años de edad y es casada y fruto de esta hermosa relación tiene dos hijos. La socia Neli se dedica a la venta de salchipapas al frente de su domicilio de forma ambulatoria,  ella vende sus ricos potajes por las tardes de lunes a viernes, ella en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar pollo, papa, salchicha, arroz, salsas (Mayonesa, Aji, Mostaza y otras), bolsas de plástico, platos descartables y otras cosas más. El sueño de Neli es abrir un restaurante. La socia Neli pertenece al banco comunal “Señor de Qoyllority de Lucre” de la Asociación Arariwa de la ciudad del Cusco.
texts.en:
Neli is a member who was born in the District of Lucre in Quispicanchi Province, Department of Cusco. She is 30 years old, married, and has two children.

Neli sells "salchipapas" (sausages and potatoes) in front of her home as a street vendor. She sells this delicious potato dish in the afternoons, Monday through Friday. Neli is taking this opportunity to request a loan in order to buy chicken, potatoes, sausages, rice, sauces (mayonnaise, aji pepper sauce, mustard, and other condiments), plastic bags, disposable plates, and other items. Her dream is to open a restaurant.

Neli is a member of the Communal Bank “Señor de Qoyllority de Lucre”, which is part of Asociación Arariwa in the city of Cusco.

loans.use: to buy chicken, potatoes, sausages, rice, sauces, plastic bags, disposable plates, and other items.

loans.name: Martin

texts.en:
Martin is a father of four children, all of whom are of school-going age. He says that farming has been his family's source of livelihood for the last seven years and that he has the focus to make it bigger. He is thirty-five years old. Martin sells his produce, mainly maize and horticultural products, at the local markets.

Martin has requested a loan of 52,000 KES from Juhudi Kilimo to buy and insure a dairy cow. He says that the expansion of his farming business will ease his family's needs as well as help him to continuously improve his farming and make it more lucrative.

Martin points to the scarcity of capital and the high cost of farming inputs as the major hindrances to his farming business. He is however glad that Juhudi Kilimo is helping smallholder farmers mitigate such challenges.

loans.use: to buy and insure a dairy cow.

loans.name: Phat

texts.en:
Phat is a fisherman, while his wife is a vegetable farmer. They have been married since 1987 and have five children, three sons and two daughters. Two are married. One lives separately, another one is a garment worker and still lives at the family home, one is a driver, and the other two are in school. The family lives in a suburb of Phnom Penh City. 

Phat is asking for a loan in the amount of $800 to supplement his own money to purchase a new motorbike for his daughter who is a garment worker to drive to work. Because the old motorbike breaks, it uses more gasoline and costs more money then new ones.

loans.use: to buy a new motorbike for his daughter

loans.name: Damary

texts.en:
Damary is a resident of Kitale in Western Kenya where she lives with her family of three children who are between 14 and 7 years old. She runs a retail shop to supplement her farming business to provide her family with basic needs. She has been in farming for 20 years and currently produces maize, milk and horticultural products.

Damary has requested a loan of 45,000 KES from Juhudi Kilimo to build a greenhouse, which she will use to boost her horticultural farming business. She believes this improved farming will provide enough income to meet the family's basic needs.

Damary, however, points to a lack of adequate rain and the fluctuation in market prices as the major challenges.

loans.use: To construct a greenhouse

loans.name: Chhavy

texts.en:
Chhavy (pictured above) is 33 years old and her husband, Vuthy, is 32 years old. They have been married since 2005 and they have one son who attends school and one daughter who is still young. The family lives in a village about 25 kilometers from Phnom Penh City. 

Chhavy sells fish that her husband catches. Her husband is a fisherman and a rice farmer. In addition, she runs a tailoring business. 

Chhavy wants to build her own house to live in because she is staying with her parents. Hence, she is applying for a loan of $1,300. With the house, which Chhavy will build with money from the loan, she will stay separately from her parents.

loans.use: To finish building her house.

loans.name: Vinani

texts.en: Because of her need to generate an income to improve her family’s well being, Vinani began her business of selling vegetables. Vinani is a widowed woman who lives with her five children who are between 29 and 37 years old. Her main clients are the neighboring community members. Vinani is requesting her first loan through Yehu Microfinance Trust, an organization she has been a part of for five months. This organization made it possible for her to set up her business, in order to give it a more comfortable environment. She will use the money from her first Kiva loan to buy sacks of green vegetables, tomatoes, and potatoes for resale in order to increase the opportunities in the market, such as responding to new customers that have been referred by the current buyers and those whose attention she wants to capture.

loans.use: to buy sacks of green vegetables, tomatoes, and potatoes for resale

loans.name: Jane

texts.en:
Jane has been in active farming for 15 successive years and currently runs her farm, which produces mainly maize, beans, fruits, eggs and vegetables with the help of one farmhand whose services she currently engages on a permanent basis. She is married with six children who are all schooling.

Jane has requested a loan of 55,000 KES from Juhudi Kilimo to expand her poultry farming by buying more birds at 30,000 KES and expanding the poultry housing unit at 25,000 KES. She plans to venture into dairy farming as well and believes she will be able to educate her children from the farming income.

Jane says the impact of poultry diseases and the high cost of feed still remain the major challenges.

loans.use: To buy poultry birds and expand the poulty housing unit

loans.name: Chantha

texts.en: Chantha is 33 years old. She is a mother of two children and resides with her husband in Takeo Province, Cambodia. She has been selling food for more than two years, earning approximately $8 per day. Her husband helps her run the business. Her children are still in her care. Due to the difficulty in her family, Chantha is requesting a loan of $1000 to purchase a motorbike to commute. This purchase will help her reduce her transportation expenses. In the future, she would like to expand her business and help her children earn bachelor’s degrees. Moreover, she hopes to rebuild her present house to make it bigger and more convenient for her family.

loans.use: to purchase a motorbike to commute

loans.name: Cherotich

texts.en:
Cherotich is forty one years old and has been in farming for ten years in her rural home in Kitale where she lives with her family of seven children aged between one and sixteen years. She runs a retail shop in the local market to supplement her farming income.

Cherotich has requested a loan of 60,000 KES from Juhudi Kilimo to buy poultry at 30,000 KES and to build a poultry housing unit at 30,000 KES. She believes this will be a big boost to her farming business and will ease the pressure she has in providing for the basic needs of her big family. She is focused on doing bigger scale farming to enhance her family financial security.

She remains grateful to Juhudi Kilimo for the loan services and points at lack of proper markets and animal diseases as the main challenges in the farming business.

loans.use: To buy poultry and build a poultry housing unit

loans.name: Evelyn

texts.en:
Evelyn is 39 years old and married with six children.

Evelyn works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested an PHP 11,000 loan through NWTF to buy items like shampoo and groceries to sell in her general store.

Evelyn has borrowed and repaid 8 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 9 years and also earns an income from food vending.

Evelyn aspires to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy items like shampoo and groceries to sell in her general store.

loans.name: Higinio

texts.es:
Higinio es un hombre de 41 años, es casado, vive con su esposa en la ciudad de Ica; él es un hombre muy emprendedor y trabajador, siempre ha velado por el bienestar de su familia y ha luchado por sacarlos adelante; a Higinio le hubiera gustado mucho poder estudiar la carrera universitaria de Administración, lamentablemente por falta de recursos no pudo hacerlo, pero sueña con poder estudiar algún día.
Gracias a su deseo de salir adelante y progresar, Higinio trabaja en una empresa agro exportadora de la ciudad, donde se desempeña como técnico en sistemas de riego, el trabaja un aproximado de 8 horas diarias, él se encuentra muy a gusto en su trabajo, ya que lo consideran mucho por su puntualidad, eficiencia en su labor y buen trato hacia los demás. 
Higinio se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la limpieza y arado de un terreno propio donde desea sembrar algodón y maíz; de esta manera podrá incrementar sus ingresos económicos, los cuales le servirán para brindarle una mejor calidad de vida a su esposa, así también espera poder estudiar pronto la carrera de Agronomía que tanto desea.
texts.en:
Higinio is a 41-year-old man who is married and lives with his wife in the city of Ica.  He is a very enterprising and hardworking man.  He always has watched over the well-being of his family and fought to give them a good start in life.  Higinio very much would like to have been able to study administration in the university.  Unfortunately he couldn't do it due to lack of resources, but he dreams about being able to study one day.

Thanks to his desire to get ahead and progress, Higinio works in an agricultural export company in the city, where he works as a manager in irrigation systems.  He works approximately eight hours a day.  He is very comfortable in his job because they appreciate him for his punctuality, efficiency, and good manner with the others.

Higinio is very grateful to the Kiva lenders because thanks to the help given he will be able to do the cleaning and plowing of his plot of land, where he wants to plant cotton and corn.  This way he will be able to increase his income, which will help him give his wife a better quality of life.  He also hopes to be able to study in the agronomy program soon, something he wants very much.

loans.use: to clear and plow his plot of land.

loans.name: Jose Lenin

texts.es: José Lenin de 58 años de edad , tiene como actividad económica  servicios funerarios y a la elaboración de ataúdes, él ya tiene varios años de experiencia en esta actividad y durante este tiempo ha llegado a conocer mucho sobre el manejo de su negocio. El motivo del crédito es para la compra de madera, pega, tela, clavos, entre otros productos. De esta manera obtendrá un buen medio ingreso para lograr su objetivo.
texts.en:
José Lenin is 58 years old and has a business that involves providing funeral services and manufacturing coffins. He has several years of experience in this business. Throughout this entire time, he has gained a lot of knowledge about how to manage his business.

The reason for this loan is so that he can buy wood, glue, fabric, nails, and other supplies. With the help of this loan, he hopes to earn an above-average income so that he can achieve his goal.

loans.use: to buy wood, glue, fabric, nails, and other supplies for making coffins.

loans.name: Ermelinda

texts.es: La socia Ermelinda nació en el distrito de Cusco de la provincia de Cusco del departamento del Cusco pero actualmente vive en la ciudad de Lucre, ella tiene 40 años de edad y es casada y fruto de esta hermosa relación tiene cuatro hijos. La socia Ermelinda tiene un pequeño restaurante donde prepara almuerzo. Ya son dos años que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien gracias al desempeño que realiza en su restaurante. La socia Ermelinda también se dedica a la venta de platos típicos de la región como por ejemplo chiriucho en las fiestas patronales, ella en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar insumos como por ejemplo sacos arroz, sacos azúcar y otras cosas más.  El sueño de la socia Ermelinda es comprarse una casa pues actualmente vive en una casa alquilada. La socia Ermelinda pertenece al banco comunal “Señor de Qoyllority de Lucre” de la Asociación Arariwa de la ciudad del Cusco.
texts.en: Ermelinda was born in the district of Cusco, in the province of Cusco, in the department of Cusco, but now lives in the city of Lucre.  She is forty years old and is married, and the fruit of their happy relationship is four children. Ermelinda has a small restaurant where she prepares lunch.  She has done this work for two years, and it is going well due to her performance in the restaurant.She also works selling typical local dishes at patronal festivals. She now needs a loan to buy ingredients, such as bags of rice, bags of sugar and other things.  Ermelinda's dream is to buy herself a house, as she currently lives in rental housing.  Ermelinda belongs to the "Senor de Qoyllority" communal bank of the Asociacion Arariwa in the city of Cusco.

loans.use: to buy ingredients such as bags of rice, bags of sugar and other things.

loans.name: Sok

texts.en:
Sok is 42 years old and her husband, Cheng, is 43 years old. They have been married for five years. They live in a village about 25 kilometers from Phnom Penh City and they have seven children. One of the children is married and lives outside the family home, one is a construction worker, two are garment workers and others are attending school. 

Sok and her husband are rice and lotus farmers. She is applying for a loan of $1,500 to add to her own money to purchase two oxen for plowing her farmland because she has to spend a lot of money on renting a motorized hand tiller from her fellow villager.  

With the oxen, Sok will plow her farmland when farming season comes and save some money by not spending on renting a motorized hand tiller any more.

loans.use: To purchase two oxen.

loans.name: Juma

texts.en:
Juma lives in the town of Kwale with his wife and five children who range in age from 12 to 26 years old. In his store, he sells food supplies and general household items to the neighboring families for their daily consumption. 

Everyone in the family knows the tasks associated with the business. Therefore, he gets assistance in the shop from his wife who offers her services and generates more income. He can also leave his children in charge of the store because they are qualified. Juma is a hardworking person who is always involved in productive activities. Previously, he was a farmer and sold a variety of farm produce such as green vegetables and tomatoes. 

To further establish his business, he is seeking a Kiva loan and coming to Yehu Microfinance for his first financing. With this loan, he will purchase supplies of food items like wheat flour, maize flour and sugar in higher volume than he normally does so that he can buy at substantial discounts and continue being competitive by taking advantage of market opportunities to support himself and make each day more successful.

loans.use: to purchase supplies like wheat flour, maize flour and sugar

loans.name: Reynita De Belen De Ccorao Group

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal REYNITA DE BELEN DE CCORAO; la socia Hilda tiene 31 años, casada y tiene 3 hijos, la socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de compra y venta de cereales como maiz, moraya, kinua, papa entre otros, la socia vende de forma ambulatoria en las distintas ferias  que se llevan a cabo los fines de  semana, la socia es una persona alegre y responsable con muchas ganas de continuar trabajando por su familia.

La socia solicita el préstamo para la compra de mercadería como maíz.

Los otros socios se dedican al negocio de tienda de abarrotes, crianza de animales menores, venta de granos secos, venta de artesanía, lavado de carros,crianza de cuyes.

La socia agradece este medio por el cual le facilita el crédito y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos.
texts.en:
Hilda is a member of the Communal Bank "Reynita de Belen de Ccorao". She is 31 years old, married, and has three children. Hilda divides her time between her daily activities and her business of buying and selling staples such as corn, freeze-dried potatoes, quinoa, potatoes, and other items. She sells as a street vendor at the different fairs that are held on the weekends. Hilda is a cheerful and responsible person who has the desire to continue working on behalf of her family.

She is requesting a loan to buy merchandise, such as corn.

The other members engage in businesses such as managing grocery stores, raising small animals, selling dried grains, selling handicrafts, washing cars, and raising guinea pigs.

Hilda is grateful to receive her loan in this manner and promises to complete her payments.

loans.use: to buy basic staples, such as corn.

loans.name: Eluzai

texts.es:
Eluzai, se dedica a la venta de verduras y frutas, vive en casa propia, junto con sus dos hijos y su esposo, el negocio lo tiene en el mercad, lo atiende desde las 7:00am hasta las 3:00pm.
Ella solicita un préstamo para la compra de frutas y verduras frescas para surtir el negocio, ya que le ayudara a mejorar la atención con los clientes, abasteciéndose de papas, plátanos, repollo, manzanas, sandias, peras, fresas.
El objetivo de Eluzai es convertirse en una comerciante exitosa, aumentando el número de clientes, y ofreciendo una mejor calidad de vida a su familia.
texts.en:
Eluzai sells vegetables and fruit.  She lives in her own house with her two children and her husband.  Her business is located in the market.  She works there from 7:00 a.m. until 3:00 p.m.

She is requesting a loan to buy fresh fruit and vegetables to stock her business.  Stocking up on potatoes, bananas, cabbage, apples, watermelon, pears, and strawberries will help her improve her customer service.

Eluzai's goal is to become a successful merchant, increasing her clientele and giving her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy fresh fruit and vegetables.

loans.name: Nubia Isabel

texts.es:
Doña Nubia, sigue creciendo, en su negocio de pulperia, ha aumentado en estos ultimos años, gracias al empeño de sobresalir adelante, asi mismo con financiamiento.
Hoy en dia vende aticulos escolares, tropigas, verduras, es por tal razon con este nuevo financiamiento comprara: quintales de arroz, frijoles, maiz, azucar, bidon de aceite, golosinas, gaseosas, con el fin de mantener sus ventas altas y clientes sastifechos. Asi como poder pagar sus gastos personales,y sus compromisos de pagos.
texts.en:
Doña Nubia continues to grow. Her general store has increased in recent years thanks to her determination to move forward and the help of some financing. Today she sells school supplies, propane, and vegetables.

Nubia is requesting a new loan in order to buy rice, beans, corn, sugar, a drum of oil, candies, and sodas so that she can maintain her high sales and keep her customers satisfied. This will help her pay for her personal expenses and meet her payment obligations.

loans.use: to buy more merchandise for her store.

loans.name: Mayra Concepcion

texts.es: Mayra Concepción  casada de treinta y seis años de edad tiene por actividad  económica  brindar los servicios de sala de belleza. Tiene más de 9 años en este negocio, pues siempre le ha gustado ser una persona muy emprendedora y se siente contenta al tener un medio de ingreso para su hogar. Tiene 2 hijos menores de edad a su cargo, en la actualidad Mayra ha sabido mantener su herramienta de trabajo dando servicio de calidad a sus  clientes Este crédito es para la compra de peines, cepillo, aceites, tratamientos, planchas, secadoras, shampoo entre otros productos. ella desea comprar su propia casa ya que alquila.
texts.en: Mayra Concepcion is thirty-six years old and married, and operates a beauty salon. She has had this business for more than 9 years.  She has always been very enterprising and she is happy to have a way to provide income for her household.  She has 2 minor children in her charge.  Mayra has been able to maintain her work tools and provide quality service to her clients.  This loan is to buy combs, oils, treatments, flat irons, dryers, shampoo and other products.  She would like to buy her own house since she rents.

loans.use: to buy combs, brushes, oils, treatments, flat irons, dryers, shampoo and other products.  She hopes to buy her own home since she rents.

loans.name: Kresytle Carolina

texts.es:
Kresytle es una joven de 21 años, soltera, vive con sus padres y hermanos en la ciudad de Pisco, a pesar de su corta edad es una joven emprendedora con un gran deseo de superación y ganas de salir adelante; en sus ratos libres le gusta dedicar un poco de tiempo para hacer deporte y en algunas ocasiones prepara un riquísimo “Arroz con Pato” para engreír a su familia; con empeño culminó sus estudios secundarios, lamentablemente por falta de recursos económicos no puedo estudiar la carrera de Administración de Empresas que tanto quería, pero sueña con poder hacerlo algún día. 
Por iniciativa propia y gracias al apoyo de su familia, desde hace más de un año Kresytle trabaja en su negocio de venta de abarrotes y cervezas, ella dedica a su negocio un aproximado de 13 horas diarias, en las cuales puede atender hasta 36 clientes; ella cree que su negocio marcha bien debido a sus buenos precios y buena atención.
Kresytle se encuentra muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra de mercadería, tales como: arroz, azúcar, leche, aceite, menestras, entre otros; de esta manera su negocio estará mejor abastecido y podrá atraer más cliente, así podrá incrementar sus incrementar sus ingresos, con los cuales poco a poco espera poder tener un puesto de ventas propio en el mercado central de la ciudad.
texts.en: Kresytle is a young woman of 21, single, and lives with her parents and siblings in the city of Pisco, Peru. Despite her young age she is an enterprising woman with a strong desire to move up in life and make headway. In her free time she likes to play sports, and sometimes she makes a delicious "Arroz con Pato" (Rice with Duck) dish to spoil her family. With hard work she completed her high school education, but sadly she could not study for the business administration degree she so wanted because of a lack of resources, but she hopes it will happen some day. On her own initiative and thanks to her family's support Kresytle has worked at her business selling groceries and beers for more than year. She dedicates about 13 hours a day to the business, serving up to 36 customers. She believes her business is heading in the right direction thanks to its good prices and good service. Kresytle is very grateful for Kiva lenders because thanks to your help she will be able to purchase supplies like rice, sugar, milk, oil, vegetables and other items. In this way, her business will become better stocked and she can attract more customers, thus increasing her income. Little by little she hopes to be able to have her own sales post in the city's central market.

loans.use: to purchase rice, sugar, milk, oil, vegetables, etc.

loans.name: Jonas

texts.es: Jonás  es un joven  muy  responsable  al cual   le   gusta  contribuir   con los  gastos  de   su  hogar,  nos  comenta  que  además  de  estudiar   el  trabaja, se acerco  a la  institución  ya  que   requiere  realizar  la  compra de  un aire  acondicionado  para  su  casa  ya  que   en  estas   temporadas  de calor   su  domicilio  esta   muy  caliente, ve  en el crédito  la  posibilidad  de  que   su  familia  tenga  un poco  de  comodidad por  lo que  agradece el apoyo  brindado para la realización de  su  proyecto además de la  facilidad para  realizar  los  pagos.
texts.en: Jonás is a very responsible young man who likes contributing to the household expenses. He tells us that he works in addition to going to school. He approached Kiva partner Credituyo because he wants to purchase an air conditioner for his home, which gets very hot during this time of year. He sees the loan as a chance for his family to be a little more comfortable, and he is grateful for the support in carrying out this project as well as the ease in making the payments.

loans.use: to purchase an air conditioner.

loans.name: Amparo Del Socorro

texts.es: Amparo del Socorro casada con dos hijos menores de edad, tiene por actividad económica venta de mercaderia en general  ubicada en su en el mercado de la localidad  Actividad que inicio con esfuerzo propio para poder ayudarse con los gastos económicos de su familia, en la actualidad la su actividad economica  ha venido creciendo gracia al apoyo que fundación le ha brindado con los prestamos los cuales lo ha invertido en productos mercaderia en general . En el futuro su sueño es crecer y llegar a tener una una tienda de ropa variada  El financiamiento lo está solicitando para la compra  de productos como: ropa de adulto, ropa de niños, zapatos, utiles escolares, comesticos,
texts.en:
Amparo del Socorro is married with two minor children.  Her job is selling general merchandise in the town market, a business she started on her own initiative to be able to help with her family's expenses.  Currently her business has been growing thanks to the support the foundation has given her with the loans, which she has invested in general merchandise.

Her dream is to grow in the future and manage to have a store with a variety of clothing.

She is requesting the loan to buy products such as clothing for adults and children, shoes, school supplies, and cosmetics.

loans.use: to buy clothing for children and adults, shoes, school supplies, and cosmetics.

loans.name: Los Exitosos Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “LOS EXITOSOS”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Juana ella es viuda y tiene 63 años y tiene 2 hijos; La socia trabaja con su negocio de venta de artesanía, la socia hace trabajos como carteras ,monederos y tejidos,la socia también se dedica al negocio de manualidades como trabajos como muñequería ella hace muñecas, la socia tiene un pequeño puesto donde vende estos trabajos de artesanía y manualidades, la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 5:00 p.m,por medio estos pequeños negocios la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de artesanía y negocio de manualidades. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar materiales como telas e hilos para el negocio de manualidades y también para comprar carteras, monederoa y tejidos para su negocio de venta de artesanía.
 Los otros socios  se dedican al negocio de venta de refrigerios, negocio de venta de artesanía, negocio de pastelería y negocio de costureria.

La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
These members belong to the Communal Bank "Los Exitosos" (The Successful Ones), which is located in the District, Province, and Department of Cusco.

One of the members, Sra. Juana, is a 63-year-old widow with two children. She works in her handicrafts business where she makes and sells items such as wallets, change purses, and woven articles. Juana also has a doll-making business. She has a small stand where she sells her crafts and handmade items. Juana works from 8am to 5pm. Through these small businesses, she is able to help her children get ahead. Her dream is to expand both of her craft businesses. Juana is requesting a loan to buy materials, such as fabrics and thread. She will also buy wallets, change purses, and woven articles to sell in her craft business.

The other members engage in businesses that involve selling refreshments, selling handicrafts, selling pastries, and sewing.

Juana is grateful to everyone who helped to fulfill her dream in this manner. Therefore, she promises to complete her payments according to the established terms.

loans.use: to acquire fabrics and thread for making handmade dolls and to purchase wallets, change purses, and woven articles that she can sell.

loans.name: Bolia

texts.es: Bolia de 47 años de edad es una mujer casada y madre de 4 hijos en las edades de 12 a 25 años.  Ella es la propietaria de una panadería, actividad a la que fue impulsada por el conocimiento que del oficio tenia su esposo, quien con este negocio tuvo grandes desafío y debió cerrarlo temporalmente, para 10 años después darle apertura nuevamente, cuando Bolia tomó su administración, mientras su esposo se dedicó a la distribución de los productos de pueblo en pueblo y en diversos corregimientos de la región, en un vehículo de su propiedad. En su negocio trabajan su hijo y una persona que también la considera como hija y con los que sueña ver convertidos en empresarios de la panadería con gran independencia. Las compras las realizan a crédito y por ello  no ganan los descuentos propios de las  ofertas en los insumos y por la compra de contado y en mayor volumen. Esta es la razón por la cual acude a un credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, con el que comprará harina, grasas, azúcar productos que se incrementan permanentemente y con inventarios de ellos en su haber, logrará estabilizar sus utilidades y ahorrar en el costo de los productos. Esto es justamente lo que garantiza el éxito de su credikiva.
texts.en:
Bolia is 47 years old, married, and the mother of four children ranging in ages from 12-25.  She owns a bakery, which was motivated by her husband’s knowledge of the business.  She had lots of challenges with this business and had to close it temporarily.  Ten years later it reopened when Bolia took charge of managing it, while her husband took charge of delivering the products in his car from town to town and different areas around the region.  Her son also works in the business, as well as another person whom she considers to be like a daughter.  She hopes to see them both become entrepreneurs in the bakery and be independent.

They buy on credit and they don’t get any cash or volume discounts for their supplies.  For this reason she is requesting this Kiva loan.  It’s her first loan through Fundación Mario Santo Domingo and she will use the money to buy flour, shortening, and sugar products; products that increase in price and by having an inventory of their own they will be able to save on the cost of the products.  This is what justly guarantees the success of her Kiva loan.

loans.use: to buy supplies.

loans.name: Carmen

texts.es:
Carmen tiene 41 años de edad, es casado  y cuenta con un hijo en edad escolar. Vive en uno de los caseríos que conforman la zona rural del distrito de Mórrope, una zona agrícola de la región Lambayeque, de pobladores humildes y de costumbres basadas en tradiciones que vienen de épocas muy antiguas. La mayoría de los centros poblados cuentan con una calidad de vida bastante precaria. El distrito pertenece a la región Lambayeque. 

Se dedica a la crianza y comercialización de animales, Carmen realiza esta actividad desde hace diez años y conoce bastante bien su negocio, al igual que la mayoría de pobladores de la zona, heredó este modo de ganarse la vida de sus padres. Sus animales son criados en su domicilio, los alimenta de granos y pastos naturales. Cuando estos ya han alcanzado un buen tamaño y peso los vende en el mercado local o con los negociantes de la zona. El negocio cuenta con bastante competencia  pero también cuenta con un amplio mercado. Adicionalmente Carmen se dedica a trabajar en labores agrícolas, con lo que se agencia de ingresos adicionales que le ayudan a sacar adelante a su familia. 

Carmen desea adquirir aves de corral así como alimento balanceado para poder ampliar su negocio. Para ello ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 500 nuevos soles. El es una persona bastante estimada y reconocida en la zona donde vive.
texts.en:
Carmen is 41 years old, married and has a school-aged son.  He lives in one of the settlements that make up the rural district of Mórrope, an agricultural zone in the Lambayeque region.  The people are humble and the customs are based on age old traditions.  The district is part of the Lambayeque region.

He raises and sells livestock.  Carmen has been doing this for ten years and knows the business well, as do most of the residents in the zone.  He learned this way of making a living from his parents.  He raises his animals in his home and feeds them with natural grains and grass.  When they reach a good size and weight, he sells them in the local market or to the businesses in the zone.  His business has lots of competition, but there is also a large market.  Additionally Carmen does farm work, which provides him additional income that helps him get his family ahead.  Carmen wants to acquire corral birds and balanced feed so that he can expand his business.  For this he has seen fit to request a loan of 500 PEN through Edpyme Alternativa.  He is a well-known and respected person the zone where he lives.

loans.use: to buy birds and feed.

location.town: Anexo La Zorra - Caserío Arbolsol - Morrope - Lamb

loans.name: Jose Santos

texts.es: José Santos es casado con hijos mayores de edad tiene por actividad económica la  compra y venta de ganado, lo cual comercializa con los ganaderos de su localidad, este emprendedor tiene varios años de  desempeñarse en dicha actividad  los cual tiene mucha experiencia, José santos  ha expresado que con el apoyo que fundación león 2000 le ha brindado ha podido salir adelante con su negocio , y de esa forma ha cumplido con metas y objetivo que se había propuesto como es tener una vivienda propia para el bienestar de su familia, el está solicitando el financiamiento para la compra de ganada como Vaca pinta, vaca Brahama, toros, terneros entre otros.
texts.en:
José Santos is married with adult children. His economic activity is buying and selling cattle. He markets the livestock to the stockbreeders in his area. This resourceful man has spent several years engaged in this enterprise and has had a great deal of experience.

José Santos states that with the support provided him by  Fundación León 2000 he has been able to succeed in his business. Consequently he has met his goals and objectives, such as owning his own home for the well being of his family. He is requesting funding to purchase cattle, such as Vaca Pinta (Spotted Cows), Vaca Brahama (Brahman cows), bulls and calves among others.

loans.use: to buy cattle, such as Spotted Cows, Brahman Cows, bulls and calves, among others.

loans.name: Bertha

texts.es:
Bertha tiene 60 años de edad. Vive desde hace diez años junto a su nieto de once años de edad y un hermano en el caserío Sipán, en el distrito de Zaña. La zona es conocida por el hallazgo de las tumbas del Señor de Sipán, una de los mayores atractivos turísticos del país. La comunidad se dedica principalmente al comercio, a la agricultura y a la ganadería.

Ella cuenta con una picantería desde hace doce años, allí ofrece a sus clientes diversas bebidas así como platos de comida, su negocio le ha servido para hacerse conocida en la zona y actualmente cuenta con clientela fija. Los ingresos que percibe de esta actividad los utiliza para ayudar a solventar la economía de su familia.

Bertha se encuentra solicitando a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1000 nuevos soles que piensa utilizar para realizar arreglos en el local, asimismo en la  compra de víveres y bebidas para ofrecer al público, para sí ofrecer una mejor atención y contar con mayor clientela.
texts.en:
Bertha is 60 years old and has been living with her 11 year old grandson for the past ten years, and one of her brothers in the Sipán settlement in the Zaña district.  The zone is known for being the location where the “Señor de Sipán” tombs were discovered and this is one of the main tourist attractions in the country.  The community primarily raises and sells crops and livestock.

She has had a restaurant for 11 years, where she offers her clients different drinks as well as dishes of food.  Her business has helped make her well known in the zone and she currently has steady customers.  She uses the income from this activity to cover her family expenses.

Bertha is asking for a loan of 1,000 PEN through Edpyme Alternativa, which she plans to use to fix up her restaurant and also buy food items and drinks so that she can offer them to her customers.  In this way she can provide better service and have more customers.

loans.use: to buy food and drinks.

loans.name: Adán

texts.es:
Adán es un padre de familia de 44 años de edad que reside junto a su esposa y a cuatro hijos en uno de los caseríos que conforman la parte rural del distrito de Tambogrande, una zona de clima semi tropical, productora de mango y limón. Pertenece a la región Piura. 

Se dedica a trabajar en labores relacionadas a la agricultura desde muy joven por lo que conoce el negocio a la perfección. Por un lado cría ovejas y cerdos en corrales acondicionados cerca de su domicilio para engordarlos y venderlos en el mercado local. Adicionalmente cuenta con una hectárea de terreno agrícola en donde ha instalado limón. Con los ingresos de ambas actividades ayuda a su familia con el sostenimiento de su economía diaria. Su esposa se dedica a la crianza y venta de aves de corral. 

Adán desea adquirir fertilizantes para aplicarlos a su cultivo de limón y así asegurarse una buena producción, por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar por primera vez a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1500 nuevos soles que le ayuden a lograr su objetivo. 

Adán es una persona bastante empeñosa y trabajadora, todos sus esfuerzos tienen como meta sacar adelante a su familia. Sus vecinos y conocidos le tienen bastante estima y respeto.
texts.en:
Adán is a 44 year old father who lives with his wife and four children, in one of the settlements that make up the rural district of Tambogrande, a semi-tropical climate where mangos and lemons are produced.  It’s part of the Piura region.

He has been working in farming since he was very young and he knows the business perfectly.  On one hand he raises sheep and pigs in pens set up near his home and sells them in the local market.  He currently has a hectare of land where he has his lemon grove.  With the income from both activities, he is able to help support his family financially.  His wife raises and sells corral birds.  Adán wants to buy fertilizer to apply to his lemons and in this way have a good production.  For this reason he has decided to request this first loan of 1,500 PEN through Edpyme Alternativa that will help him reach his objective.

Adán is a hardworking, enterprising person.  All of his goals have the aim of getting his family ahead.  His friends and neighbors admire and respect him.

loans.use: to buy farming supplies.

loans.name: Nazgul

texts.ru: Назгул  – участница группы «Мырза», ей  41 год, замужем, воспитывает 2 детей. В качестве  источника дохода для семьи, Назгул занимается животноводством.  Имея в хозяйстве 2 дойные коровы, 5 овец  с приплодом,  Назгул  имеет ежемесячную прибыль в сумме 3,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Назгул обратилась в компанию «Бай – Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 40,000 сом (KGS) на покупку дополнительных голов мелкого рогатого скота. Доходы Назгул планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение своего  хозяйства.
texts.en: Nazgul is a member of the Mirza group. She is 41 years old, married and is raising two children. Nazgul engages in raising livestock as a source of income for her family. With the two dairy cows, five sheep with offspring in her farm, Nazgul has a monthly income of 3,000 soms (KGS). In order to further develop her business, Nazgul appealed to Bai-Tushum and Partners for a loan in the amount of  40,000 soms (KGS) to buy additional small grazing animals. Nazgul plans to use the income earned to further improve her household.

loans.use: to purchase livestock

loans.name: Clara Violeta

texts.es:
Clara tiene 57 años de edad,  es soltera y tiene solo un hijo, vive junto a su hijo y a su nuera en el distrito de Morropón, ubicado en la región Piura. 

Se dedica desde hace cinco años a la venta de artículos de primera necesidad como arroz, azúcar, aceite, asimismo vende útiles escolares y también prendas de vestir.

Clara se encuentra solicitando a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 3015 nuevos soles que piensa utilizar en la ampliación de su negocio: tiene planeado comprar andamios, mostradores y mercadería de modo que pueda satisfacer la creciente demanda de sus clientes y de esa forma obtener más ingresos para su familia y en consecuencia una mejor condición de vida.

El mercado es potencial para que invierta en este tipo de negocio, ya que la zona no cuenta con mercado de abastos y ella es una de las principales vendedoras de la zona. Uno de sus objetivos primordiales es captar más clientes, dar una mejor atención y sobre todo ser una de las principales abastecedoras de artículos de la zona, y para lograr todo ello, se esfuerza al máximo.
texts.en:
Clara is 57 years old, single and has one son.  She lives with her son and daughter in law in the Morropón district, located in the Piura region.

For the past five years she’s been selling primary needs items such as rice, sugar, and cooking oil.  She also sells school supplies and clothing.

Clara is requesting a loan of 3,015 PEN through Edpyme Alternativa and plans to use it to expand her business.  She plans to buy scaffolding, display cases, and merchandise of all types so that she can satisfy her growing demand.  In this way she will be able to increase her income for her family and be able to provide them with a better quality of life.

The market is strong for investing in this type of business, now that the zone doesn’t have a supplier and she is one of the main sellers.  One of her objectives is to gain more customers, provide better service, and above all be one of the main suppliers in the zone.  She will put forth great effort to achieve this.

loans.use: to buy merchandise.

loans.name: Ahmadbeg

texts.ru: Ахмадбег добрый семьянин, на воспитании имеет семерых детей. Его семья очень большая. Более 18 лет он занимается выращиванием плодовых деревьев и рисоводством. Полученные плоды граната он продает на рынке за выгодную цену. Его жена занимается домохозяйством. Ахмадбег хочет обрабатывать свою землю и посеять рис на продажу и для семейных нужд. Ахмадбег запрашивает займ для покупки минеральных удобрений и семян риса. Он надеется на вашу помощь и заранее благодарит всех вас за ваше доброе дело.
texts.en: Ahmadbeg is a good family man and has brought up seven children. His family is very big. For more than 18 years, he has engaged in the cultivation of fruit trees and rice. He sells the resulting pomegranates at the market at a reasonable price. His wife is a homemaker. Ahmadbeg wants to cultivate his land and plant rice to sell at the market for his family needs. Ahmadbeg is requesting a loan to buy fertilizer and rice seeds. He looks forward to your help and thanks you in advance for your good work.

loans.use: To buy mineral fertilizers and seeds

loans.name: Sonunbubu

texts.ru: Сонунбубу  55 лет, вдова, имеет 2 детей. В качестве  источника дохода для семьи, с 2002 года Сонунбубу занимается животноводством, стартовав с суммы 20,000 сом (KGS).  Имея в хозяйстве 2 дойные коровы, Сонунбубу  получает ежемесячную прибыль в сумме 15,000 сом (KGS) с продажи молока и молочных продуктов. В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Сонунбубу обратилась в компанию «Бай – Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS) на покупку бычков на откорм и перепродажу. Доходы Сонунбубу планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение своего  хозяйства.
texts.en:
Sonunbubu is a 55-year-old widow with two children. Sonunbubu raises animals as a source of income for the family, starting in 2002 with the sum of 20,000 soms (KGS). With the two dairy cows in her homestead, Sonunbubu receives monthly income in the amount of 15,000 soms (KGS) from the sale of milk and dairy products. 

With the aim of further developing her business, Sonunbubu appealed to Bai-Tushum and Partners for a loan in the amount of 100,000 soms (KGS) to buy calves for fattening and resale. Sonunbubu plans to invest the income earned in further improving her household.

loans.use: to purchase cattle

loans.name: Leonor

texts.es:
Doña Leonor tiene 67 años de edad, es madre soltera, tuvo 12 hijos quienes ya  son mayores de edad, vive con una hija y una nieta en una aldea del municipio de Choloma, Cortes.
Ella se ha dedicado a los oficios domésticos pero hace 15 años tuvo la oportunidad de ejercer sus habilidades en corte y confección, ella elabora ropa de cama como sabanas, sobre fundas y otros y cortinas. Los trabajos que realiza son por pedidos, sus clientes son de la comunidad.
Solicita un préstamo a ODEF para comprar materiales como ser: telas, hilos, encajes y adornos que utiliza en la elaboración de las sabanas y cortinas y que tengan buena presentación y sus clientes queden satisfechos. También una parte lo destinara para comprar otra máquina de coser, con esta inversión va aumentar la producción y sus ganancias.
Su meta es que su negocio crezca mas y que en el futuro quede un negocio establecido a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Doña Leonor is 67 years old and a single mother of 12 children, all of whom are grown. She lives with a daughter and granddaughter in a neighborhood in the town of Choloma, Cortes.

Leonor has been a devoted homemaker, but 15 years ago she took the opportunity to utilize her sewing and tailoring skills. She produces bed sheets, slip covers, and curtains. Her work is performed according to the orders received from her customers in the community.

She is requesting a loan from ODEF in order to buy materials such as fabrics, thread, lace, and adornments that she can use for making bed sheets and curtains so that they will have a nice appearance and keep her customers satisfied. Leonor will also use part of the loan to buy another sewing machine. With this investment, she will be able to increase her production and her earnings. Her goal it grow her business even more. In the future, she wants to leave behind a well-established business for her children.

loans.use: to buy fabrics, thread, lace, adornments, and another sewing machine.

loans.name: Rosendo

texts.es: Tener tres buenas maquinarias de hidrolavado para atender la demanda de vehículos que requieren ser higienizados y un local propio y bien acondicionado, es uno de los sueños de Rosendo, que poco a poco planea cumplir con un trabajo esmerado, responsable y mancomunado.  Él,  en el municipio donde habita con su esposa y sus 4 hijos, en las edades de 6  a 9 años, es muy conocido porque realiza servicios de albañilería y pintura, pero como todo oficio estacionario, esta actividad no le ofrece la oportunidad de un ingreso estable, por eso en compañía de su cuñado y su hermana, se dieron a la tarea de ofrecer el servicio de lavandería de vehículos y motocicletas, actividad con la que les ha ido muy bien y ha despertado grandes expectativas de crecimiento empresarial en todos ellos, pero están enfrentados al desafío de no tener un capital de trabajo suficiente,  para lograr su mejoramiento productivo y aumentar su capacidad competitiva. Esta es la razón por la cual acude a un credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, mediante el cual comprara una maquina hidrolavadora, para iniciar el camino de crecimiento esperado, en un potencial mercado que lo espera y en el que se proponen ganar dinero, para lograr que su familia cumpla los sueños de éxito que se propongan enfocándolo en estudios de alta calidad, como también es el propósito de Rosendo.
texts.en:
To have three good pressure washers to serve the demand for vehicles that need to be cleaned, to have his own shop, and to have it well equipped: this is one of Rosendo's dreams that he plans to achieve little by little, through painstaking, responsible and combined work.

In the municipality where he lives with his wife and four children, ages 6 to 9, he is well-known because he does bricklaying and painting, but as with any  trade, there are slack times, and this occupation doesn't provide him the opportunity for a steady income. That's why, jointly with his brother-in-law and his brother, he took up the task of providing a service washing vehicles and motorcycles.

This business that has gone very well and has awakened high expectations in all of them for growing as entrepreneurs. But they are facing the challenge  of not having sufficient working capital to achieve productivity improvements and increase their ability to compete. This is why he is applying for a credikiva loan, his first from Fundación Mario Santo Domingo.

Through the loan, he will buy a pressure washer, to start on the path toward the growth he hopes for, in a potential market that awaits, and where he has his mind set on earning money. This is in order that his family can achieve their dreams for the success that they have set their minds on, centering on high quality education, as is also Rosendo's aim.

loans.use: To buy a pressure washer.

loans.name: Aurelio Martin

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “VIRGEN GUADALUPE-CUSCO”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Aurelio Martin; el socio continua brindando el servicio de taxi por las diferentes calles del Cusco, el socio trabaja desde las 6:00 a.m hasta las 10:00 p.m aproximadamente,el socio es una persona responsable y empeñosa ,el socio desea poder continuar trabajando en su negocio siendo de esta manera que el sale adelante. 

El socio solicita el préstamo para el mantenimiento de su carro y comprar llantas.

El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Sr. Aurelio Martin is a member of the Communal Bank "Virgen Guadalupe-Cusco", which is located in the District, Province, and Department of Cusco.

He continues to provide taxi services by traveling through the different streets of Cusco. Aurelio works from 6am to approximately 10pm. He is a responsible and industrious individual who wants to continue working in his business so that he can get ahead. The loan he is requesting will be used for automobile maintenance and to buy tires.

Aurelio is pleased with the loan and promises to complete his payments.

loans.use: to pay for vehicle maintenance and to buy tires.

loans.name: Olivier

texts.es: Olivier Enrique, tiene la edad  de 28 años, está casado,  vive con sus dos hijos y la esposa  actualmente. El con el crédito pretende comprar almacigo de café y los  insumos requeridos parar  el mantenimiento del café  como abonos y fumigaciones  y ayudarse con la mano de obra. El tiene pensado comprar este almacigo para su posterior siembra en una propiedad que lo dejo su padre y que actualmente este baldía la propiedad y con los  insumos darle el adecuado mantenimiento y tener en  excelente condiciones la plantación y así poder generar más ganancias  y obtener una mejor calidad de vida y una estabilidad económica. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Olivier Enrique is 28 years old, married, and currently lives with his wife and two children. He intends to use this loan to buy a coffee seedbed and the required supplies for maintaining his coffee crop, such as compost and fumigation products. Olivier will also pay for labor to assist him. He plans to buy a seedbed so that he can eventually transplant the seedlings over to a piece of property left to him by his father. The land is currently barren, but with the right supplies and adequate maintenance, he will have a plantation with excellent conditions. As a result, he will be able to generate more income and obtain a better quality of life and financial stability.

This is the first loan he has received from FUDECOSUR. Olivier has not received any other loans from the state banks. FUDECOSUR is providing this loan with better terms and a lower interest rate.

loans.use: to buy a seedbed and farming supplies.

loans.name: Nancy Estamilda

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “LIDERANDO LAS PALMERAS”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Nancy Estamilda;La socia continua con su negocio de snack cafetería,la socia lleva buen tiempo en este su negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada dia,la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 9.00 p.m aproximadamente,siendo de esta manera que la socia saca adelante a su familia. 

La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar insumos para su negocio como azucar. 

La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the communal bank "LIDERANDO LAS PALMERAS". The bank is located in the district of Cusco, belonging to the province of Cusco and department of Cusco.

The member is Nancy Estamilda. She continues with her snack café business. She has been working in this business for a long time and it is going well thanks to her daily efforts. The member works from 8:00 a.m. until 9:00 p.m. approximately, as this is the way she manages to get her family ahead.

The member is requesting a loan to buy supplies for her business such as sugar.

The member is grateful to those who form part of this dream by means of lending and she is committed to paying her loan payments in the established time period.

loans.use: to buy supplies for her business such as sugar.

loans.name: Amelia

texts.es: La  señora  Amelia es una persona  responsable y  muy trabajadora  la  cual   se  dedica a la venta de ropa   usada este   negocio le permite  salir  adelante   día  con día   brindándole  la posibilidad  de   ofrecer  a sus  hijos  mejores   condiciones de   vida, es  por  ello  que  en  esta  ocasión se acerco  con  nosotros  ya que  desea  realizar  la compra  de ropa   para  seguir  trabajando, ve  en el crédito la posibilidad de  hacer   crecer   su  negocio por lo que  se  encuentra  muy  contenta, agradece  el  apoyo  brindado  para la realización de  su  proyecto.
texts.en: Amelia is a responsible and hard working person who makes a living selling used clothing. This business allows her to get ahead day by day and gives her the possibility of offering her children better living conditions. This is the reason she came to us, as she wants to buy clothes in order to continue working. She sees a loan as a possibility to make her business grow and so she is very happy. She is grateful for the support offered to carry out her project.

loans.use: to buy clothes for resale.

loans.name: Lida

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “LIDERANDO LAS PALMERAS”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Lida;La socia continua con su negocio de snack cafetería, la socia lleva buen tiempo en este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada dia,la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 9.00 p.m aproximadamente,siendo de esta manera que la socia saca adelante a su familia,la socia es una persona alegre y responsable con muchas ganas de salir adelante por su familia. 

La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar implementos para el snack como sillas.
 
La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the communal bank "LIDERANDO LAS PALMERAS". The bank is located in the district of Cusco, belonging to the province of Cusco and department of Cusco.

The member is Lida. She continues with her snack bar/café business. She has been working in this business for a long time and it is going well thanks to her daily efforts. The member works from 8:00 a.m. until 9:00 p.m. approximately, as this is the way she manages to get her family ahead. She is a happy and responsible person with a great desire to help her family get ahead.

The member is requesting a loan to buy furniture for her business such as chairs.

The member is grateful to those who form part of this dream by means of lending and she is committed to paying her loan payments in the established time period.

loans.use: to buy furniture for her snack bar such as chairs.

loans.name: Maria Eugenia

texts.es:
La socia Maria Eugenia nació en la provincia de Puno del departamento del Puno pero actualmente vive en la ciudad de Lucre de la provincia del Cusco, ella tiene 23 años de edad y tiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene una hija. La socia Maria Eugenia se dedica a la venta de comida de forma ambulatoria, ella vende sus platos de comida  desde las 10 de la mañana hasta las 2 de la tarde  de lunes a viernes, ella en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar insumos como por ejemplo sacos de arroz, sacos de azúcar, verduras, aceite, condimentos y otras cosas más. El sueño de la socia Maria Eugenia es comprarse un terreno para construir una casa. 

La socia Maria Eugenia pertenece al banco comunal “Señor de Qoyllority de Lucre” de la Asociación Arariwa de la ciudad del Cusco.
texts.en:
Maria Eugenia was born in the province of Puno but currently lives in the town of Lucre in the province of Cuzco. She is 23 years old and is in a cohabitation relationship from which she has one daughter. As a loan group member, Maria Eugenia is a traveling food vendor.  She sells her meals from 10 am to 2 pm Monday through Friday.  At this time, she needs a loan to buy staples such as sacks of rice, sacks of sugar, vegetable oil, spices and other items. The dream of loan partner Maria Eugenia, is to buy land to build a house. 

Maria Eugenia belongs to the community bank "Lord of Lucre Qoyllority" of the Arariwa Association of the city of Cuzco.

loans.use: to purchase staples such as bags of rice, bags of sugar, vegetables, oil, spices and other items.

loans.name: Anabelisa

texts.es:
Anabelisa es una madre de familia de 55 años de edad. Vive junto a su esposo y a su menor hijo en uno de los caseríos que conforman la zona rural del distrito agrícola de Tambogrande en la región Piura. La zona es productora de frutas como el mango y el limón. La mayor parte de sus comunidades rurales no cuenta con todos los servicios básicos, en el caso de la comunidad de Anabelisa, esta solo cuenta con energía eléctrica.  



Anabelisa se dedica desde hace más de cuatro años a la crianza y comercialización de ovejas y aves de corral. Ella cría estos animales en corrales ubicados cerca  a su domicilio, los alimenta con granos y pastos naturales y cuando ya han alcanzado un peso y tamaño adecuados los comercializa en el mercado local. Los ingresos que percibe de esta actividad los utiliza para ayudar a su esposo, que es agricultor, con el sostenimiento de la economía de su familia.



Ella se encuentra solicitando a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 3000 nuevos soles que piensa utilizar en la compra de alimento balanceado para engordar a sus animales y realizar mejoras en el corral. Esto le permitirá lograr que sus animales se desarrollen de mejor modo para que sean vendidos a un precio más justo. Del mismo modo le permitirá crecer como empresaria y obtener una mejor calidad de vida.



Anabelisa es una mujer bastante trabajadora y responsable. Ella agradece de antemano a las personas que le ayudarán con este préstamo.
texts.en:
Anabelisa is 55 years old and is a mother. She lives with her husband and her minor son in one of the settlements that make up the rural area of the agricultural district of Tambogrande in the region of Piura. The area produces fruits such as mango and lemons. The majority of the rural communities do not have basic services, as is the case with Anabelisa's community, which only has electricity.

Anabelisa has made a living for more than four years raising and selling sheep and poultry. She raises these animals in pens located close to her house. She feeds them grain and natural pasturage and when they have reached an adequate size and weight she sells them in the local market. The income she receives from this activity goes towards helping her husband, who is a farmer, to maintain their family.

She is requesting a loan from Edpyme Alternativa for 3,000 PEN which she will use to buy balanced feed to fatten her animals and to make improvements in her pens. This will allow her animals to grow in the best way possible so that they can be sold at a better price. In this way she will be able to grow as a businesswoman and obtain a better quality of life.

Anabelisa is quite a hard working and responsible woman. She is grateful to the people who will help her with this loan.

loans.use: to buy balanced feed to fatten her animals and make improvements in her pens.

loans.name: Josefina

texts.es: La socia Josefina nació en el distrito de Lucre de la provincia de Quispicanchi del departamento del Cusco, tiene 34 años de edad y tiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene un hijo. La socia Josefina se dedica a la crianza de animales menores como cuyes y también se dedica al guiado de turistas. Ya son 10 años que Josefina se dedica a la crianza de animales menores y le va muy bien. La socia Josefina en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para hacer mantenimiento de las jaulas y para la alimentación como por ejemplo forraje, alfalfa, vitaminas y concentrados (mezclas de diferentes harinas). El sueño de la socia Josefina exportar carne de cuy. La socia Josefina pertenece al banco comunal “Señor de Qoyllority de Lucre” de la Asociación Arariwa de la ciudad del Cusco.
texts.en:
Josefina is a member who was born in the District of Lucre in Quispicanchi Province, Department of Cusco. She is 34 years old, in a common-law relationship, and has one child. Josefina raises small animals, such as guinea pigs, but she also works as a tour guide. She has been raising animals for 10 years and has done very well. Josefina is taking this opportunity to request a loan for maintaining the guinea pig cages and to buy fodder, vitamins, and concentrated feed (a mixture of different grains). Her dream is to become an exporter of guinea pig meat.

Josefina is a member of the Communal Bank “Señor de Qoyllority de Lucre”, which is part of Asociación Arariwa in the city of Cusco.

loans.use: to buy fodder, vitamins, and concentrated feed and to pay for maintenance of her guinea pig cages.

loans.name: Dionisio Rene

texts.es: Dionisio René  casado con dos tres hijos menores de edad, tiene por actividad económica venta de planta y  jardinería  en la cual se ha desempeñado desde hace varios años como herencia de trabajo de sus padres, en la actualidad el se está haciendo cargo de dicha herramienta de trabajo la cual ha sabido trabajarla y superarse en clientela calidad y económicamente, con el apoyo que fundación león 2000 le ha brindado, el está solicitando el financiamiento para comprar material de trabajo como:  flores de diferentes colores, flores naturales, flores arteriales, podadoras, rastrillos, tijeras, fumigadoras, entre otros.
texts.en:
Dionisio René is married with three minor children.  His job is selling plants and gardening, which he has done for several years as work he inherited from  his parents.  Currently he is becoming responsible for the work tool he has learned how to use and improve himself in clientele, quality, and economically.

With the support of Fundación León 2000, he is requesting a loan to buy work materials such as flowers of different colors, natural flowers, "arterial" flowers, lawnmowers, rakes, scissors, fumigators, and others.

loans.use: to buy flowers, lawnmowers, rakes, scissors, fumigators, and other supplies.

loans.name: Juan Javier

texts.es: Javier  es una persona  trabajadora  y   muy  emprendedora,  el se  acerco a la  institución  ya que  su mayor  sueño  es acondicionar  su   vivienda  ya  que  es  el  patrimonio de  sus  hijos,  nos  comenta que  actualmente   el  requiere   colocar  un techo  de lamina   enfrente  de  su  vivienda, ve  en el crédito la posibilidad  de  que   su  hogar  tenga  una mejor  imagen   por  lo que se  encuentra  muy  contento, agradece  el apoyo  brindado para la realización  de su  proyecto  y  por la  facilidad para  realizar   sus     pagos  ya  que   gracias  a  su  trabajo  de   jardinería  le  permitirá  realizar   los  abonos   cómodamente.
texts.en:
Javier is a hard working and entrepreneurial person who came to the MFI because his biggest dream is to condition his house, being the head of the family. He mentions that at present he need to place a sheet roof in front of his house. He sees the possibility of doing this with a loan so his house will have a better image. 

He is very happy and is grateful for the support offered in order to carry out his project and for the ease of making his loan payments- Thanks to his gardening job he will make his loan payments comfortably.

loans.use: to build a sheet roof.

loans.name: Luz De Lourdes

texts.es:
Doña Luz de Lourdes, sigue con su negocio de su pulperia, a si como la venta de cosmeticos y piñatas que son sus otras entradas, y que ha venido invirtiendo para el mejoramiento de su familia al poder pagar sus gastos de su familia, teniendo mas responsabilidad al ser madre soltera.
Hoy con este nuevo prestamo, comprara granos basicos, en arroz, azucar, frijoles, gaseosas, golosinas, a si como la compra de ropa nueva, aumentando de productos para sastifacaer al cliente y teniendo mejores ingresos.
texts.en:
Doña Luz de Lourdes continues with her grocery business, but she also sells cosmetics and piñatas, which are her other ventures. Luz invests in the improvement of her family by paying for the household expenses. Being a single mother, she has more responsibility.

Today with this new loan, Luz will buy basic grains, rice, sugar, beans, sodas, and candy. She will also buy new clothing to increase her inventory of products. This will enable her to satisfy her customers and generate more income.

loans.use: to buy basic staples, candies, sodas, and clothing to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy fertilizers and compost.

loans.name: Juma

texts.en:
Juma lives in Kwale, Kenya.  He is a good entrepreneur, and for five months he has owned his own business. He operates a retail shop, selling to his neighbours and passersby. 

Today his dreams continue to grow and his goals are to continue increasing his income so that he can expand to a wholesale shop and be very successful.

His market is growing and so is the amount of capital that he needs to continue providing the products his customers demand. This will be his first loan from Yehu Microfinance Trust. He will use it to buy food products, bundles of wheat flour, maize flour and household items he will promote in his business with special discounts. He wants to offer great prices to his customers so that he can continue earning their loyalty, and this is why he will be successful in investing his Kiva loan in his business.

loans.use: to buy food products, bundles of wheat flour, maize flour and household items.

loans.name: María Elena

texts.es:
