texts.ru: Насриддин-мужчина средних лет,энергичный предприниматель,имеет своё  большое дело.Он руководит цехом по производству кисло-молочных продуктов.Молодой предприниматель начал дело более 15ти лет назад.Так как он имел опыт работы в этом деле, он решил открыть собственный цех, закупил все необходимое оборудование для производства.Своих средств немного не хватало  и он решил взять небольшой кредит.Его дела пошли в хорошую сторону, конечно не сразу, но постепенно он узнавая все тонкости ,он полностью вник в своё дело.Насриддин приобрел своих постоянных клиентов,реализовал свою продукцию в магазины и торговые точки.Сейчас он мастер своего дела и под его руководство уже работают несколько человек.В нашей организации он имеет большой стаж и непрерывно кредитуется.Наши кредиты он использовал на свой бизнес, а на текущий кредит хочет закупить строительные материалы для строительных работ на своем новом участке.
texts.en: Nasriddin is a middle age man and an energetic businessman. He owns a large business, a dairy processing factory. Nasriddin started his business 15 years ago as a young entrepreneur. Since he had a lot of experience in making dairy products he decided to start his own factory and began purchasing the necessary equipment. His own funds were not sufficient so Nasriddin took out a small loan. His business is doing well, and, despite some problems early on Nasriddin has learned all the small details of his trade and is a master at it now. Currently he has his own regular clients and sells dairy products to grocery stores and markets stalls. Nasriddin also employ several workers at his factory. He has a longstanding relationship with our organization and is always taking out loans. He has used these loans to improve his business and is planning to use the current loan to purchase building supplies for construction of an additional factory.

loans.use: to pay for construction costs and supplies

loans.name: Sehllin Liseth

texts.es:
Sehllin  sigue con su negocio, de venta de ropa de segunda, asi como la venta de electrodomesticos, siendo sus entradas economicas mas altas, tambien cuenta con el apoyo economico y moral de su esposo,  quien labora como maestro de obra, sus hijos siguen cursando el año escolar.
Con este nuevo financiamiento, comprara: una paca mixta, paca de niño, paca de sabana, cuatro licuadoras, seis abanico, seis planchas, el cual son encargos, y que debe entregar en tiempo y forma, teniendo al cliente sastifecho.
texts.en: Sehllin makes a living selling secondhand clothing and appliances. She continues to grow her business and net profits, and is grateful for her husband's economic and moral support, too. Her husband works as a foreman, and their children are in school. With the support from this new loan, Sehllin plans to purchase: a bundle of mixed used clothing, a bundle of kids' clothing, a bundle of linens, four blenders, six fans, six irons (backordered). She hopes these products will help her to satisfy customer demand.

loans.use: to purchase bundles of clothing and appliances.

loans.name: Fortunato Candelario

texts.es: Fortunato de 57 años de edad se dedica a la carpintería. Nos comenta que el negocio lo aprendió por su papá quien le enseño desde muy joven el oficio. Hace 12 años que se independizo abriendo su propio taller ubicado en Duran.  De su trabajo nos comenta que le gusta trabajar con la madera dándole cambios con el objetivo de alterar su forma física para crear objetos útiles al desarrollo humano como muebles para el hogar, puertas, escritorios, camas.  El nos comenta  que esta es unas de las actividades de la industrial humana más antigua que existe por lo cual en cada cultura y regiones encontraremos diferentes maneras y herramientas de trabajar con la madera. Fortunato indica que su mayor competir actual es el aluminio el cual con el mundo moderno está ganando mucho terreno. Una de sus mayores dificultades es el transporte ya que le genera costos tanto al comprar la materia prima como cuando elabora el producto y lo entrega, pero le va bien  y espera continuar así. Fortunato de momento está separado y sus 2 hijos viven con la mamá a quien apoyo económicamente. Con el crédito tiene pensado comprar una maquinaria para el proceso de la madera esperando crecer en la industrial y dar empleo ya que actualmente tiene un ayudante. Suerte Fortunato.
texts.en:
Fortunato is 57 years old and a carpenter.  He says that he learned his business from his father who showed him the trade when he was very young.  Twelve years ago he ventured out on his own and opened his own workshop located in Duran.  He tells us that he enjoys working with wood, making changes to it, and altering its physical form to create useful objects like furniture for the home, doors, desks, and beds.  He tells us that he is in one of humanity’s oldest industries in which we can find different tools and methods of working with wood in every culture and region.  Fortunato says that his current main competitor is aluminum, which is gaining much ground as a modern method.  One of his main difficulties is transportation, which generates costs both when he buys his supplies and when he delivers the finished products, but things are going well and he plans to continue this way.

Fortunato is presently separated and his two children live with their mother, who he supports financially.  He will use the money from this loan to buy tools with which to process the wood, hoping to develop the industry and provide employment, now that he currently has a helper.  Good luck Fortunato.

loans.use: to buy tools.

loans.name: Gulnaz

texts.en:
Gulnaz is 48 years old. She lives in a small village in Sagarejo District with her husband, Malkhaz, and their 25-year-old son. The family is busy with their agricultural business. They have two milking cows and produce cheese. Part of the cheese is used by the family, and the other part is sold to a merchant. Glanaz's family also has two hectares of land, where they grow maize and a vineyard on a small plot. During spring and summer, they perform seasonal agricultural work to get a good harvest. The family sells their products on the local open market. In addition to these activities, Gulnaz and her husband make wine in the fall and sell it with their other products. The family's total average monthly income is 1100 GEL.

Gulnaz requested a loan to increase cultivation of their land. She plans to sow more maize, and after the seasonal work is properly done, she hopes to get a larger harvest to increase sales. With a bigger profit, she will be able to reinvest in the business to expand it further, thus improving her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to sow maize

loans.name: Zafar

texts.ru: Зафар,мужчина 36 лет.Женат,имеет 3 детей.Живет в сельской местности,но занимается розничной продажей материалов для женщин в вещевом рынке района.Его клиенты женщины от 10 до 60 лет.Имеет две точки в центре рынка.Продажей занимается вместе с женой.Этим делом они занимаются более 12 лет.У него очень много клиентов.Зафар преуспевающий бизнесмен.Дома имеет продуктовый магазин,реализацией занимается родители клиента.Он не разу не нарушал политику кредитования.Данный кредит взял для расширения товарооборота.Он благодарен нашей организации.
texts.en: Zafar is a 35 year old man, married and has three children. He lives in the country but makes a living selling fabrics for women dresses at the regional clothing market. His clients are women from 10 to 60 years old. Zafar has two market stalls at the central market and manages them together with his wife. This business has been their livelihood for 12 years and Zafar has many regular clients. Since Zafar is an energetic businessman he also has a grocery store at his house which is managed by his parents. In his credit history with us he has never broken the rules of lending. Zafar is taking out this loan to expand his inventory of fabrics for sale. He is very grateful to our organization.

loans.use: purchase fabric for sewing women clothes

loans.name: Aucileadora Genara

texts.es: Aucileadora vive en el Fortín zona Norte de Guayaquil. Hace 4 años pudo empezar la construcción de su domicilio el cual es de cemento y cuenta con el servicio de agua y luz. En el Fortín faltan muchas obras para sus habitantes como el alcantarillado y camino pavimentado. Aucileadora tiene 30 años y está casada con Segundo quien trabaja como Operario en una gasolinera. Tienen 2 hijos quienes se encuentran estudiando en la escuela fiscal. Ella tiene una tienda de abarrotes ubicada en su domicilio donde provee a sus clientes de arroz, azúcar que vende por libra, víveres, artículos de limpieza, carnes, pollos etc. el negocio lo abrió con la ayuda de su esposo ya que era ama de casa pero deseaba contribuir con la economía del hogar. Tiene un año con el negocio y le va muy bien pues tiene muchos clientes. Abre la tienda desde las 8 de la mañana hasta las 10 de la noche y realiza la atención sola. Le gusta mucho su negocio porque puede disponer del tiempo necesario para la crianza de sus hijos y ayudarlos con sus tareas. Con el crédito comprara mercadería para tener en stock. Aucileadora nos comenta que su sueño es abrir una sucursal con la cual tendría más ventas y mejoraría su situación económica.
texts.en: Aucileadora lives in the Fortín zone north of Guayaquil. Four years ago she was able to begin the construction of her home, which is made of cement and has electrical and water service. In Fortín, there are many services the residents do not have, such as sewer systems and paved streets. Aucileadora is 30 years old and is married to Segundo, who works as an operator at a gas station. They have two children who attend a state school. She has a grocery store located in her home where she provides her customers with rice and sugar that she sells by the pound, groceries, cleaning supplies, meat, chicken, etc. She opened the business with the help of her husband since she was a housewife but wanted to contribute to the household finances. She has had the business for a year, and it is going very well for her, since she has many customers. She opens the store from 8 in the morning to 10 at night and tends it herself. She likes her business a lot because she can have the necessary time to raise her children and help them with their homework. With the loan she will buy merchandise to have in stock. Aucileadora tells us that her dream is to open a branch with which she will have more sales and improve her economic situation.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar, and foodstuffs for her store.

loans.name: Jorge

texts.es: Jorge de 63 años vende jugos en una zona muy concurrida de Libertad. Está casado y su esposa es ama de casa ya que cuida a su hija menor quien tiene 11 años y asiste a la escuela fiscal, sus otros hijos ya son mayores de edad. Jorge nos cuenta que el negocio lo inicio por insistencia de un amigo quien vende encebollados en la misma zona. Le dijo que el negocio era rentable dándole apoyo para que se decidiera. Hace varios años que trabaja de esta manera desde las 7 de la mañana hasta las 2 de la tarde. Lo realiza solo porque no podría pagarle a otra persona ya que sus ganancias se verían reducidas. En su negocio ofrece jugos naturales, colas y agua a un costo de $ 0.50 ctv. El valor es estándar para que los clientes puedan elegir, también nos comenta que siempre abre en el mismo lugar porque así se evita problemas. Con el crédito comprara hielos, colorantes, y jugos para mantener su negocio. A él le gustaría en unos años poder abrir una tienda en su propia casa.
texts.en: Jorge, 63, sells juice in a very well-traveled area of Libertad. He’s married and his wife is a housewife who cares for their 11-year-old daughter who attends public school. Their other children are independent. Jorge tells us that he started his business on the insistence of his friend who sells stew in the same area. His friend told him that business was lucrative, giving Jorge the support he needed to decide to do it. He’s been working for many years now, from 7 in the morning to 2 in the afternoon. He works his job alone as he wouldn’t be able to afford paying someone else. In his business, he offers natural juice, sodas and water for $0.50ctv. The value is standard so the clients can choose. He also lets us know that in order to keep away problems, he always opens in the same place. With the loan he is requesting, he’ll buy ice, coloring and juice to maintain his business. He’d like to open a store in his house in a few years.

loans.use: buy ice, coloring, sodas and juice.

loans.name: Rosa Esmeralda

texts.es:
Rosa, trabaja en la agricultura, tiene tres hijos de 3, 5 y 7 años de edad, viven en casa propia, ella cultiva de maíz y tomates, con esta ocupación Rosa se entretiene, aprendió a trabajar con sus padres.
Ella solicita un préstamo para la compra de abono, herbicidas, foliares, para la tomatera, estos materiales ayudaran a Rosa para mejorar la productividad y prevenir de las posibles plagas, con ello estará realizando una buena siembra para seguir proveyendo por su familia lo mejor.
La aspiración de Rosa es mantener a su familia con una condición estable, que sus cultivos sean provechosos.
texts.en:
Rosa is a farmer, and has three children, ages 3, 5 and 7. They live in their own house, and she farms corn and tomatoes. Rosa learned the trade from her parents, and her farming operation keeps her busy.

She is requesting a loan to purchase manure, herbicides, leaves and other items for tending her tomato crops. These materials will help her to increase her productivity and prevent pests and plagues. She plans to use these agricultural items to plant her crops and provide for her family. Her dream is provide stable living conditions for her family and raise healthy, successful crops.

loans.use: to purchase manure, herbicides, leaves and other inputs for tending her tomato crops.

loans.name: Obit

texts.ru: Обит мужчина в возрасте 47 лет,трудолюбивый,ответственный мужчина,женат и имеет троих детей.Занимается выращиванием сельхозпродукции а также дома откармливает скот.По бизнесу ему помогает его жена и дети,они вместе дружно живут и работают.От полученного дохода он отремонтировал свой дом,построил баню для своей семьи.На полученный кредит Обит планирует закупить скот и откормив их  хочет продать за хорошую цену.Обит благодарен "Арванд"за финансовую поддержку.
texts.en: Obit is a 47 year old man. He is a hard worker and very responsible. Obit is married and a father of three children. He is a farmer and also raises livestock for sale. His wife and children help him with the farm and all five work well with each other. Recently Obit has used the profits from the farm to improve his house and built a sauna for his family. He is planning to use the current loan to purchase livestock and sell them at the meat market after they are fattened and fully grown. Obit is very grateful to "Arvand" for the financial support in this venture.

loans.use: for purchase livestock

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a freezer.

loans.name: Lali

texts.en:
Lali is 46 years old, married, and has three children, two of whom attend school and one who helps with the dairy farm.  She lives in a small village of Sagarejo District with her family and and mother-in-law, who is a pensioner. 

Lali and her husband are busy with agricultural activities. They have three milking cows; every day they produce cheese and curds and sell them at the local open market. They also have one hectare of vineyard. They make wine in the autumn and sell it in nearby villages. The total average monthly income of the family is 1,000 Lari.

Lali is requesting a loan to purchase a truck. Her husband will be able to provide goods transportation services to local farmers. The family will earn additional income. They will also use the truck for transportation of their grapes. Using their own truck instead of a rented one will decrease transportation costs and increase their profit, which will be used to repair their house.

loans.use: to purchase a truck.

loans.name: Orzi

texts.ru: Орзи женщина в возрасте 49 лет,трудолюбивая,добросовестная женщина замужем и на воспитании имеет троих детей.Она начала свой бизнес в 2003 году  на вещевом рынке но с 2010 года Орзи начала изготовливать дома лепешки и булочные изделия.Она реализует  свои лепешки в местные столовые.Хотя этот бизнес требует большого внимания и заботы она очень любит свою работу и этот бизнес приносить ей хороший доход. На полученный кредит она хочет закупить уголь и 20 мешоков муки.Орзи надеется на вашу помощь и поддержку.
texts.en: Orzi is a 49 years old woman, hard working and conscientious. She is married and is raising three children. Orzi started as a business woman in 2003 selling clothing at the market, but in 2010 she decided to open a home bakery. She sells her flat breads to the local cafes. Even though this business requires a lot of attention and skill Orzi really likes her work and the bakery is very profitable. She is planning to use the current loan to purchase coal and 20 sacks of flour. Orzi thanks you for your help and support.

loans.use: to manufacture and sell biscuits and bread

loans.name: Esperanza Y Fe De Lampa Group

texts.es:
Este Banco se llama “Esperanza y Fe de Lampa” está conformado por 15 emprendedores quienes se dedican a diferentes rubros, entre los cuales se encuentran; fabricación de cojines artesanales, venta de pan amasado, artículos artesanales, venta de ropa. Todos ellos pertenecientes a la  comuna de Colina ubicada en la ciudad de Santiago.
Patricia, presidente del grupo del Banco Comunal, quien en la foto se encuentra de pie en primera fila ocupando el segundo lugar de izquierda a derecha, viste con un poleron color azul, su pelo es de color castaño y lo usa suelto.
Ella se dedica  al rubro del comercio en venta de berlines, queques, entre otros productos. Se desempeña en este negocio desde hace 6 años. Comenta que trabaja sola, algunas veces la ayuda su hija y su marido.
La mercadería e ingredientes que va necesitando los compra en distribuidoras y supermercados a bajo costo, por lo tanto conveniente económicamente.
Con el crédito comprará un vehículo para poder movilizarse con su mercadería a su clientela y a  diferentes partes.
Una de sus metas son adquirir una camioneta, ya que de esta manera trabajaría de una forma más cómoda, evitando el frio durante la temporada de invierno y el calor durante la temporada de verano.
Patricia vive junto a su marido quien trabaja algunas veces con ella ya que él trabaja en su carro de venta de completos, y su hija de 16 años quien se encuentra estudiando. Uno de sus sueños personal es poder arreglar su dentadura y a nivel familiar es prósperar en su negocio, para aumentar sus ingresos.
Ella está muy agradecida de la oportunidad brindada por Fondo Esperanza, ya que el crédito le permitirá invertir en su negocio. Además se siente cómoda con el grupo del Banco Comunal del cual forma parte, ya que es muy unido y solidario.
Colina es una comuna de la región metropolitana (donde está Santiago, capital de Chile) ubicada al norte de la misma. Actualmente es centro de importantes inversiones, principalmente en el área agro industrial, debido a la instalación de grandes e importantes empresas, que de paso entregan un gran número de empleos a la comunidad. Es también un área de parcelaciones de agrado, lo que ha contribuido a aumentar considerablemente el número de habitantes. También cuenta con espacios adecuados al turismo, tales como termas, deporte en la Laguna Piedra Roja y montañismo.
texts.en:
This Communal Bank is called "Esperanza y Fe de Lampa" and consists of 15 entrepreneurs who engage in different trades that include producing handmade cushions, selling "pan amasado" (Chilean kneaded bread), making handcrafted articles, and selling clothes. All of the members are from the community of Colina, which is located in the city of Santiago.

Patricia, the president of the Communal Bank, appears in the photo standing in the first row in the second position, going from left to right. She is wearing a blue fleece vest and has brown hair that is pulled down. Patricia sells cream-filled donuts, cupcakes, and other products. She has been in this business for six years. Patricia says that she works alone, but sometimes she has help from her daughter or her husband. The supplies and ingredients that she needs are purchased from distributors and supermarkets at low cost, which is convenient for her financially. With this loan, she will purchase a vehicle so that she can deliver her products to her customers and to different areas. One of her goals is to acquire a truck so that she can perform her work more easily. This will help her stay out of the cold during the winter and avoid the heat during the summer.

Patricia lives with her husband who works with her on occasion by driving his car to sell the completed products. Her 16-year-old daughter is studying. One of her personal goals is to have dental work done to fix her teeth. She also wants to prosper her business and increase her income in order to raise her family's standard of living. Patricia feels comfortable being a part of her Communal Bank since they are very unified and supportive.

Colina is a community in northern section of the region of Metropolitana (where the Chilean capital of Santiago is also located). This area is currently a center of major investment, primarily in the agro-industrial field. Due to the presence of many large and important companies, a great number of jobs have been created in the community. There are also recreational areas, which have contributed to the considerable increase in the number of residents. Colina also has adequate spaces for tourism, including spas, sports events at Laguna Piedra Roja, and mountain climbing.

loans.use: to buy a vehicle for delivering her goods.

loans.name: Nolvia Eliseni

texts.es:
Nolvia, vive con su esposo y tres hijos mayores de edad, que le ayudan a trabajar en el negocio, ella administra una panadería y comedor, ella tiene 10 en el negocio, trabaja de lunes a sábado, esto lo aprendió de su familia.
Ella solicita un préstamo para la compra de materiales como harina, azúcar, levadura, leña, huevos, manteca, que son los necesarios para realzar el pan, esta compra le ayudara a mantener abastecido  la panadería y mejorar la producción.
La aspiración de Nolvia es fortalecer más el negocio, para crecer y mejorar la productividad de la panadería, con el objeto de que su familia tenga una mejor estabilidad.
texts.en: Nolvia lives with her husband and 3 children, who are of the age of majority and who help her with the business. She administrates a bakery and an eating area, she has 10 years in the business. She works from Monday to Saturday and learned the business from her family. She’s requesting a loan to buy ingredients, like flour, sugar, yeast, kindle, eggs and butter, which are necessary to make bread. This shopping will help her maintain her bakery well stocked and improve production. Nolvia aspires to strengthen her business, and to grow and improve productivity of the bakery in order to give her family more stability.

loans.use: buy flour, sugar, yeast, kindle, eggs and butter.

loans.name: Jose Napoleon

texts.es:
Jose, es agricultor, vive con su familia, es padre de dos hijos que dependen de él, el inicio con el trabajo agrícola por iniciativa propia, el terreno en el que trabaja es alquilado, no tiene un horario establecido.
El solicita un préstamo para la compra de materiales como el abono, herbicidas, que estos materiales son necesarios para iniciar el trabajo y preparar la tierra, este préstamo le permitirá la compra teniendo todo lo necesario para poder trabajar.
La aspiración de José es tener éxito en sus cosechas y proveer a su familia lo necesario, además de que espera apoyar a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Jose is a farmer; he lives with his family, and is the father of two children who depend on him.  He began his farm work on his own initiative.  The land he works is rented and he does not have a fixed schedule.

He is asking for a loan to buy supplies such as fertilizer, and herbicides, as he needs these to begin working and to prepare the land.  This loan will allow him to buy everything he needs to work.

Jose’s motivation is to succeed in his harvest and supply his family.  He also hopes to support his children.

loans.use: to buy farming supplies.

loans.name: Komronbek

texts.ru: Комронбек успешный,трудолюбивый парень в возрасте 25 лет,проживает и работает в свем селе.Он дома занимается выращиванием скота. Не смотря на молодость Комронбек уже 6 лет занимается этим видом деятельности  и знает все трудности и преимушество этого бизнеса.На полученный доход он помог родителям выдать замуж сестру и недавно сам женился.А еще он работает землемером.По бизнесу ему помогают его мать и жена.На полученный кредит он хочет закупить несколько коров и надеется на вашу поддержку.
texts.en: Komronbek is a successful and hard working young man. He is 25 years old and still lives and works in his home village. Komronbek raises cattle, and has been successful in his business despite his youth. He has been raising cattle for the last 6 years and knows all the disadvantages and advantages of this business. He also works as a land measurer. Recently Komronbek was able to help his parents finance his sister's wedding and has gotten married himself as well. His mother and wife help him take care of the cattle. Komronbek wants to use this loan to purchase more cows and hopes for your support.

loans.use: to purchase livestock

loans.name: Ismoil

texts.ru: Маматкулов Исмоил мужчина 64 лет.Женат,имеет 4 детей.С 20 лет занимается откормом и купли продажей скота.Дополнительно занимается выращиванием сельхоз культур.Очень ответственный,пунктуальный человек.По откорму скота помогает его жена и дети,так как основной доход семьи в основном от животноводства.С 2003 года он является активным,лояльным клиентом.Ни разу не имел случаев просрочек.Данный  кредит берет для покупки холодильника,так как в летний сезон содержать продукты питания очень трудно.Он благодарен нашей организации и надеется на вашу поддержку.
texts.en: Ismoil is a 64 years old, married and has four children. He has been raising and fattening livestock as well as farming for 20 years. Ismoil is a very responsible and punctual man. His wife and kids help him with the farm and the animals since raising livestock is the main source of income for the family. He has been an active and loyal client since 2003 and has never delayed a payment. Ismoil wnts to use the current credit to purchase a refrigerator since it is hard to keep produce and meat from spoiling during the hot summer months. Ismoil is grateful to our organization and hopes for your support.

loans.use: to buy a refrigerator and dishes

loans.name: Santa Cipriana

texts.es:
La Sra. Cipriana es una mujer muy trabajadora y responsable. Vive con sus dos hijos ya grandes, y se dedica desde hace 11 años a la fotografía, tanto así que ha llegado a ser fotógrafa profesional. 
Además de la fotografía cubre eventos sociales tales como bodas, quince años, fiestas, entre otros. El sueño de Cipriana es hacer que su negocio crezca para poder ejercer la profesión que con tanto esfuerzo logro alcanzar. 
Cipriana solicita el crédito para compra de materia prima para su negocio. Ella agradecerá cualquier ayuda que se le pueda brindar, ya que su negocio es su única fuente de ingresos y con ello día a día mantiene su hogar.
texts.en:
Cipriana is a hardworking, responsible woman.  She lives with her two adult children and has been a photographer for 11 years, so much so that she’s become a professional photographer.

Aside from photography, she covers social events such as weddings, girls’ 15 year birthdays, and parties among other things.  Her dream is to grow her business to be able to exercise her profession that she managed to build with such effort. 

Cipriana is asking for this loan to buy supplies for her business.  She appreciates any helps she can get, now that her business is her only source of income and she must support her household daily.

loans.use: to buy supplies for her business.

loans.name: Qosim

texts.ru: Косим- 32летний мужчина, женат и у него трое детей.Живет со своей семьей отдельно от родителей, но помогает им в содержании семьи.Косим работает  водителем в управлении водоканала несколько лет имеет постоянную работу.Но зарплата гос.учреждения не хватает на жизнь и поэтому  у него дополнительный бизнес-он водит грузовую автомашину.Каждый день у него есть заказ на развозку товаров за определенную плату.Косим хочет купить маленький микроавтобус и запустить его на линию маршрутного такси.На такие цели он обратился к нам за кредитом.Родители не против его плана.
texts.en: Qosim is 32 years old, married and has three children. He lives with his family separately from his parents but supports them as well. Qosim works as a driver for the water channels authority and has had this stable job for a few years now. However, his salary is not enough to support his family so Qosim supplements his income by working as a truck driver. He has daily jobs to transport goods to various places for a fee. Qosim wants to use this loan to purchase a mini van and start a shuttle business. His parents support his business idea.

loans.use: to buy a vehicle

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy popsicles, cones, ice cream, and sorbet in various flavors.

loans.name: Gulshanoy

texts.ru: Гульшаной женщина в возрасте 38 лет.Замужем,имеет 3 детей.Живет в селе,но работает в районной больнице, в двойной смене.Очень ответственная,пунктуальная женщина.Муж ее работает разнорабочим,а также выращивает сельхоз культуру.С 2011 года кредитуется в нашей организации.Последнее время у нее возникли проблемы со здоровьем. Данный кредит берет для лечения.Она надеется на вашу помошь и поддержку.
texts.en: Gulshanoy is 38 years old, married and has three children. She lives in a village but works for the regional hospital on two different shifts. She is a very responsible and punctual woman. Gulshanoy's husband is a day laborer and also grows produce for sale. She has been receiving loans from our organization since 2011. Recently Gulshanoy has had health problems and is requesting this loan to finance her medical treatment. She hopes for your help and support.

loans.use: to pay for medical treatment

loans.name: Carlos Enrique

texts.es:
Carlos, administra una tienda, el es un profesional en ingeniería Industrial, es propietario de la tienda de productos de primera necesidad y venta de recargas telefónicas, tiene tres hijos, está casado, este negocio lo heredo de su madre.
El solicita un préstamo para la compra de productos como granos básicos, arroz, frijoles, azúcar, bebidas y saldo para recargas, este préstamo representa un gran apoyo para Carlos, pues lograra mejorar la variedad y que sus cliente continúen asistiendo a su negocio.
El objetivo de él es tener un negocio cada vez mas amplio, mejorando la variedad de productos a través de los prestamos, generando mayor rentabilidad.
texts.en:
Carlos manages a store and is an industrial engineering professional.  He owns the store that sells primary needs items and phone cards.  He has three children, is married, and he inherited this business from his mother.

He is asking for a loan to buy products such as basic grains, rice, beans, sugar, drinks, and time for phone cards.  This loan will be of great support for Carlos, as it will allow him to improve the variety so that his customers will continue to patronize his business.

His objectives are to have an ever expanding business, improve the variety of products through the help of the loans, and increase his profits.

loans.use: to stock his store

loans.name: Basilio

texts.es:
El socio Basilio nació en la provincia de Chumbivilcas del departamento del Cusco pero actualmente él vive en la comunidad de Huchuy Qosqo de la provincia de Calca, 

El socio Basilio se sigue dedicando a la agricultura,  ganadería y a la construcción  de obras.  Ya son varios años que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su trabajo. El socio Basilio en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar un ganado. El socio Basilio sigue perteneciendo al banco comunal “Huchuy Qosqo” de la Asociación Arariwa de la ciudad del Cusco.
texts.en:
This member was born in the Chumbivilcas province, within the Cusco department, but he currently lives in the Huchuy Qosqo community of the Calca province.

Basilio still farms, raises livestock, and does construction labor.  He has been doing this for several years and things are going very well for him, thanks to the effort he puts into his work.  On this occasion Basilio needs a loan to buy livestock.  He continues to belong to the “Huchuy Qosqo” communal bank of the Arariwa Association of the city of Cusco.

loans.use: to buy livestock.

loans.name: Lizardo Nieves

texts.es:
Lizardo es un hombre de 30 años, soltero, vive en casa de sus abuelos en la ciudad de Cañete, distrito de Imperial, es Técnico Agropecuario, eligió esa profesión por que le interesa mucho todo lo relacionado con el medio ambiente; gracias a la ayuda de sus padres quienes lo han apoyado siempre, él cuenta con campos de cultivo de maíz y manzanas.
Lizardo trabaja desde que tenía  18 años, él es muy entusiasta y trabajador; desde hace más de 10 meses trabaja como Técnico Agropecuario, asimismo, se desempeña como encargado de la supervisión del personal en una organización que se encarga de la sanidad agraria de la ciudad, él se siente muy a gusto con su trabajo, ya que puede ejercer su carrera.
Él se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra de una laptop, un escritorio y útiles, ya que pretende volver a estudiar y le serviría de mucho  contar con dichos implementos para poder realizar sus trabajos y de esta manera espera poder fortalecerse como profesional ya que pronto desea poder cumplir su gran sueño de poner un negocio de venta de productos agrícolas y brindar servicios de asesoría, contribuyendo de esta manera a que un futuro no muy lejano pueda tener su casa propia.
texts.en:
Lizardo is a 30-year-old man who is single and lives in his grandparents’ house, located in the city of Cañete in the Imperial district. He is an agricultural technician, a profession he chose because he is very interested in all things related to the environment. Thanks to the help of his parents who have always supported him, he has fields for planting corn and apples.

Lizardo has worked since he was 18, and is enthusiastic and hard-working. For more than ten months he has worked as an agricultural technician. He is also in charge of supervising staff at an organization responsible for agricultural health in the city. He is very happy with his job, as it allows him to put his studies to use.

Lizardo is very thankful to Kiva lenders, as thanks to the help they give he will be able to buy a laptop, a desk and school supplies, as he plans on going back to school. Having these items will help him a lot to carry out his work. In this way he will consolidate his professional career, and hopefully he will be able to realize his biggest dream: to have a business selling agricultural products and providing advice. In this way he will be able to have his own home in the not-so-distant future.

loans.use: To buy a laptop, desk and school supplies as he plans to start studying again.

loans.name: Jose Angel

texts.es:
José es un joven de 21 años, es soltero, vive con su madre y hermanos en la ciudad de Cañete, distrito de Imperial, él es un joven muy trabajador y emprendedor, él ha trabajado desde muy joven apoyando a su padre en su negocio de albañilería y se ha desempeñado en otros trabajos; con mucho empeño culminó sus estudios secundarios, lamentablemente por trabajo no pudo terminar de estudiar su carrera profesional de Ingeniería Civil. 
Desde hace más de 6 meses, José trabaja como asesor de ventas en una tienda de electrodomesticos, él dedica gran parte de su tiempo a trabajar, ya que tiene el deseo de poder ayudar a sus padres y hermanos a salir adelante.
José se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la refacción y mejoramiento de su vivienda, el desea poder arreglar la fachada de la casa de su madre con quien vive; de esta manera poco a poco podrá ayudar a su familia y con ellos cumplir su gran sueño de poder llegar a concluir sus estudios de Ingeniería Civil y lograr ser un buen profesional y un hombre de bien.
texts.en:
José is a young 21-year-old man. He is single and lives with this mother and siblings in the city of Cañete, Imperial district. Since he was very young he has worked worked helping his father in his construction business and has held other other jobs. He completed secondary school with a lot of determination. Unfortunately, due to work, he was unable to finish his professional education as a civil engineer. 

For the past six months, José has worked as a salesperson in a household appliances store. He spends most of his time working as he wants to help parents and his siblings to get ahead. 

José is very grateful to the Kiva lenders because thanks to the help they he has been offered he will be able to improve and make repairs to his home. He hopes to be able to fix the front of his mother's house, who he lives with. In this way, little by little he will be able to help his family and realize his dream with them to finish his studies to be a civil engineer and become a good man and professional.

loans.use: to make repairs and improve his home.

loans.name: Yuliza  Yeraldine

texts.es:
Yuliza es una mujer de 27 años, natural de la ciudad de Pisco, distrito de San Andrés, caracterizado por sus pobladores agradables, que en su mayoría realizan trabajos de pesca en el mar; Yuliza es conviviente, de cuya relación tiene una pequeña hija de 6 años.

Desde hace más de 2 años, Yuliza se dedica a la administración de una embarcación marisquera que le heredo su Padre, gracias a dicha embarcación Yuliza ha logrado conseguir ingresos económicos los cuales sirvieron para construir su vivienda. 

Yuliza se encuentra muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar el mantenimiento que necesita su embarcación  a fin de evitar riesgos en su negocio; de esta manera podrá mejorar sus ingresos y cumplir su sueño de  lograr que su pequeña hija sea una gran profesional, así como mejorar la calidad de vida para ella y su familia.
texts.en:
Yuliza, 27, is from the city of Pisco in the district of San Andrés, which is known for its warm people, most of whom work in sea fishing.  Yuliza has a common-law husband and a six-year-old daughter.

For two years, Yuliza has been managing a seafood boat she inherited from her father, thanks to which she has been able to earn enough income to build her own home.

Yuliza is very grateful to the Kiva lenders, because thanks to their help she will be able to pay for boat maintenance and avoid risks in her business.  This means she can improve her income and meet her goal of giving her daughter a professional education, as well as improve her family's quality of life.

loans.use: To pay for boat repair and maintenance.

loans.name: Sarah

texts.en:
Sarah lives in Airport Community She is  41 years old, married, and has  three children, two of whom attend school.   She sells rubber dishes such as cups, bowls, plates, spoons, and buckets in the market. She started this business with help from her grandmother and learned how to sell from her.

Sarah is requesting a loan, which she will use to purchase dishes such as cups, bowls, plates, and spoons for her business. Her plans are to build a house and educate her children.

loans.use: to purchase dishes such as cups, bowls, plates, and spoons for her business.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “MADRES TRABAJADORAS”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

El socio continua con su negocio de carpintería metalica como la elaboracion de ventanas,puertas entre otros,el trabaja de forma independiente , a la vez el socio es maestro construccor trabajando en las distintas obras que lo solicitan siendo de esta manera que el socio saca adelante a su familia,el socio es una persona alegre y responsable con muchas ganas de continuar trabajando.

El  socio solicita el préstamo para comprar herramientas para su trabajo como martillos y motosierra.

El socio está agradecido por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The  member belongs to the "MADRES TRABAJADORAS" ("Working Mothers") communal bank. The bank is located in the district of Cusco, province of Cusco, department of Cusco.

The member continues with his metalwork business.  He makes things like windows and doors, among others.  He works independently.  He is also a master builder working on different jobs that are requested of him.  This is the way that the member gets his family ahead.

The member is a happy and responsible person with a great desire to continue working.  He is requesting the loan to buy tools for his work.  He will buy tools like hammers and a chainsaw.

The member is grateful for the loan and committed to repaying it as agreed.

loans.use: to buy work tools like hammers and a chain saw.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a food cart.

loans.name: Luisa

texts.es:
La socia Luisa nació en el distrito de Chichero de la provincia de Urubamba del departamento del Cusco pero actualmente ella vive en la comunidad de Huchuy Qosqo de la provincia de Calca, 

La socia Luisa se sigue dedicando a la venta animales menores como por ejemplo cuy y gallinas. Ya son varios años que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su trabajo. La socia Luisa en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar animales menores como por ejemplo gallinas y cuyes. La socia Luisa sigue perteneciendo al banco comunal “Huchuy Qosqo” de la Asociación Arariwa de la ciudad del Cusco.
texts.en:
This member was born in the Chichero district of the Urubamba province of the Cusco department, but currently lives in the Huchuy Qosqo community of Calca.

Luisa continues to sell small animals such as Guinea pigs and chickens.  She has been in this business for several years and things are going well for her thanks to the effort she puts into her work.  On this occasion Luisa needs a loan to buy small animals such as chickens and Guinea pigs.  Luisa continues to participate in the “Huchuy Qosqo” communal bank of the Arariwa Association in the city of Cusco.

loans.use: to buy small livestock.

loans.name: Eduardo Alexander

texts.es:
Eduardo es un joven de 20 años y a pesar de ser tan joven, su ánimo de superación es contagiante, el vive en la ciudad de Ica, ciudad que se caracteriza por tener un clima cálido y sobre todo acogedor, se desarrolla la agricultura en especial el cultivo de algodón, uva, esparrago, paprika, entre otros, asimismo se encuentra la alaguna de Huacachina, la cual se encuentra en medio de dunas maravillosas en las cuales se puede practicar deportes de aventura como el sanborad Cuando Eduardo tiene un tiempo libre le gusta mucho jugar futbol con sus amigos y vecinos de su barrio, en ocasiones aprovecha la oportunidad para comer uno de sus platillos favoritos el cual es el riquísimo “lomo Saltado”.

Día a día Eduardo trabaja como empleado en una institución de la ciudad, el trabaja alrededor de 8 horas al día y el cree que le va bien en su trabajo porque es muy responsable y sobre todo muy humilde y respetuoso.

Eduardo esta muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado el podra comprar una cocina ya que actualmente cocina a leña y es muy peligroso, lo que le ayudara a tener una mejor calidad de vida y seguir trabajando y luchando para hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Tener su casa propia”.
texts.en:
Eduardo, 20, is a young man, but despite being so young, his desire to get ahead is contagious. He lives in the cityo of Ica, characterized by its warm, and most of all, friendly climate; it’s an area of agriculture, especially cotton, grape, asparagus, and paprika among others. You’ll also find Huacachina lagoon, which is in the middle of some marvelous dunes where you can practice adventure sports, like sandboarding. In his spare time, Eduardo plays soccer with his friends and neighbors. On occasion, he’ll take the opportunity to eat one of his favourite dishes, the delicious “lomo saltado” (a stir-fry of beef strips, vegetables and French fries, all served over rice).  

Every day, Eduardo works as a city employee in an institution. He works 8 hours a day. He believes that his job is going well because he’s very responsible, and most of all, very humble and respectful.

Eduardo is grateful to the Kiva lenders for the help they’ve given him, as he’ll be able to buy a stove, since the one he has now is a wood stove, which is dangerous. This will help him improve his quality of life and help him continue working and fighting to make his dream a reality: to have a house.

loans.use: buy a stove.

loans.name: Luis Alberto

texts.es:
Luis es un hombre de 54 años, muy trabajador y emprendedor, dedicado a sacar adelante a su familia, se encuentra felizmente casado y tiene un pequeño hijo de 12 años, en sus ratos libres le gusta dedicar un poco de tiempo a la lectura y en algunas ocasiones prepara uno de sus platos favoritos como es el riquísimo “Arroz con Pollo”; con mucho esmero culminó sus estudios de Técnico en Mecánica Automotriz. 
Con empeño, entusiasmo y deseo de superación, Luis trabaja en un taller de mecánica automotriz, él puede trabajar un aproximado de 10 horas diarias, en las cuales puede atender entre 6 y 8 clientes, el se encuentra muy a gusto realizando su labor ya que tiene grandes habilidades para la mecánica.
Luis se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar el mejoramiento de su vivienda, ya que desea poder dar los acabados como pintado,  puesta de ventanas, refaccionamiento de su cocina y otros; de esta manera Luis podrá contar con un mejor ambiente para su desarrollo y el de su familia, contribuyendo poco a poco a cumplir su gran sueño de lograr que su hijo sea un buen profesional y un hombre de bien.
texts.en:
Luis is a 54 year-old man, very hardworking and enterprising, dedicated to helping his family get on in life; he is happily married and has a 12 year-old son. In his free time he likes to dedicate some time to reading and in some occasions he cooks one of his favorites dishes, such as the delicious "rice with chicken"; he graduated with great diligence as Technician in Automotive Mechanics.   

Luis works in a automotive mechanics shop with determination, enthusiasm, and drive to self-improvement. He can work approximately 10 hours a day, in which he can serve between 6 to 8 customers; he likes very much doing his job, as he has great skills for Mechanics.   

Luis is very grateful to Kiva lenders, as thanks to their help he will be able to make improvements to his house. He wishes to do the finishings as painting, installing windows, refitting the kitchen and others. In this way Luis could count on a better environment for his and his family's development, contributing little by little to his great dream of achieving that his son will be a good professional and a good man.

loans.use: to make improvements to his house.

loans.name: Anibal

texts.es:
Aníbal es un joven de 21 años, vive con sus padres y hermanos en la ciudad de Ica, en el distrito de Parcona; a pesar de ser tan joven él es muy perseverante, tiene un gran deseo de superación y muchas ganas de apoyar a su familia para salir adelante; en sus ratos libres le gusta jugar futbol con sus amigos y vecinos, y en algunas ocasiones le gusta comer un riquísimo “Arroz con Pollo” con su familia.
Con mucho esmero, Aníbal concluyó sus estudios secundarios, lamentablemente por falta de recursos económicos no pudo cursar la carrera universitaria de Contabilidad que quería, a pesar de eso él no ha perdido el deseo de estudiar; actualmente trabaja como chofer de una mototaxi de su propiedad, él dedica a su labor un aproximado de 10 horas diarias, en las cuales puede atender hasta 40 clientes, él cree que su negocio marcha bien debido a su amabilidad, respeto y buen trato hacia sus clientes.    
Aníbal se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar el refaccionamiento que necesita su vehículo, estos son: cambio de toldo, acondicionamiento de puertas y reparación del motor; de esta manera Aníbal tendrá su mototaxi en buenas condiciones y podrá brindar un mejor servicio a sus clientes y con ello podrá incrementar sus ingresos para así poder ahorrar el dinero que necesita para dar inicio a sus estudios de contabilidad y así empezar su futuro profesional.
texts.en:
Aníbal is 21 years old and he lives with his parents and his siblings in the city of Ica, in the Parcona district. Although he is very young, he is also very persistent, really eager to excel and really wants to help his family get ahead. In his free time, Aníbal likes to play soccer with his friends and sometimes he enjoys eating a delicious "Arroz con Pollo"(Chicken with rice) with his family. 

With a lot of effort, Aníbal was able to finish his secondary studies but unfortunately, because his family didn't have the resources, he was unable to continue on to university to study accounting, as he wanted.  Despite this, he hasn't lost his desire to study. He currently works driving a mototaxi, which he owns. He works about 10 hours a day, during which time he can serve 40 customers. He believes his business is going well due to his friendliness, respect and the way he treats his customers. 
  
Aníbal is very grateful to Kiva lenders because with their help he will be able to get the repairs that his vehicle needs. He will be able to change the roof/canopy, have the doors fitted and the engine repaired. Aníbal's mototaxi will be in better condition and he will be able to provide a better service to his customers and increase his income. This way he will be able to save the money he needs to begin his accounting studies and begin his professional future.

loans.use: to repair and upgrade his mototaxi.

loans.name: Samson

texts.en:
Samson is a farmer in the Nkubu area. He has been producing coffee and potatoes for the local market. That's where he gets the income that helps him meet his family income besides the income he gets from employment as a farm manager in a local tea farm. He is married with one child aged below three years.

Samson has requested a loan of 40,000 KES from Juhudi Kilimo to buy poultry for a venture into the poultry farming business. He adds his plans are to venture into dairy farming too because of the good prices for milk.

Samson says the high cost of inputs, especially pesticide. remains the major challenge

loans.use: To buy poultry

loans.name: Lorenzo

texts.es:
Lorenzo, tiene 57 años de edad, vive en casa propia,  no tiene hijos con su esposa, él se dedica a la agricultura, aprendió este trabajo desde muy joven con su padre.
El solicita un préstamo para la compra de semilla mejorada, abono, herbicidas para sembrar en esta temporada, esto le ayudara a Lorenzo a mejorar la disponibilidad de materiales para aplicarlos al cultivo y poder tener buenos resultados.
La aspiración de Lorenzo es mejorar su producción, tener una mejor estabilidad económica con su familia.
texts.en:
Lorenzo, 57 years old, lives in his own house. He has no children with his wife. He is a farmer. He learned this job from his father starting when he was very young.

He is asking for a loan to purchase improved seed, manure, and herbicides for planting this season. This will help Lorenzo to improve the availability of materials so he can apply them to his crops and have good results.

Lorenzo's aspiration is to improve his production and have better economic stability for his family.

loans.use: to purchase improved seed, manure, and herbicides.

loans.name: Yasmin

texts.en:
Yasmin lives with her husband and their six children at her own house that has neither electricity nor piped water.  She has operated a retail shop (a small store that carries a wide variety of goods) where she sells household products, bundles of wheat flour, sugar and rice. She started her business as a way to contribute to the household income. She was a farmer and she gradually sold farm produce. With her profits she bought display cases, and now she sells a little of everything according to the needs, likes, and interests of her clientele.

Her greatest challenge is that she does not have enough working capital to respond to the demand in a growing market. Yasmin needs to be prepared for these times by having inventory in her display cases to impact her market and to have good sales.

This is exactly the reason that she turns to Kiva, her fifth loan with Yehu Microfinance Trust. Yasmin will use her loan to buy merchandise, especially household items, to stock her business.

loans.use: to buy merchandise, especially household items, to stock her business.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “MADRES TRABAJADORAS”; Este banco está ubicado en el distrito de Tica Tica, provincia de Cusco, departamento de Cusco.

El socio continua brindando el servicio de taxi ,el lleva ya buen tiempo ejerciendo este trabajo el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada dia , siendo de esta manera que el socio sale adelante todos los dias ,el socio trabaja desde las 06:00am hasta las 10:00pm aproximadamente.

El socio solicita el prestamo para la compra de nuevas llantas para su carro.

El socio se encuentra satisfecho con el préstamo otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
This borrower belongs to the Madres Trabajadoras [Working Mothers] community bank. This bank is located in the district of Tica Tica, province of Cusco, department of Cusco. 

The borrower continues to offer taxi services. He's been doing well in this line of work, thanks to the effort he puts into it every day. This is how the borrower gets by every day. He works from approximately 6:00am to 10:00pm.

The borrower is requesting this loan to buy new tires for his car. 

The borrower is happy with the loan he was granted, and promises to make his payments as scheduled.

loans.use: to buy new tires for his car.

loans.name: Reyna Isabel

texts.es: Reyna Isabel de cincuenta y siete años de edad soltero con cuatro hijos mayores de edad, tiene catorce años de tener su negocio que es la venta de cosméticos de forma ambulante, Reyna inicio el negocio  con esfuerzo propio y el apoyo económico del esposo quien devengaba un salario mensual, el objetivo del préstamo es para la compra de cosméticos, los sueños y metas para el negocio y familiares es realizar mejoras en el domicilio, los cosméticos que comprara son: bases, cremas de cuerpo, crema faciales, antiarrugas, anti ojeras, desmaquilladores, mascarillas, vanidad, blus, pintura de labios, punturas de uñas,  entre otros.
texts.en: Reyna Isabel is 57 years old, single and has 4 grown children. She has had her own business selling cosmetics for 14 years. Reyna started the business on her own initiative, with economic support from her husband who was earning a monthly salary. Reyna's personal and professional goal is to be able to make improvements to her home. The purpose of the loan is to buy cosmetics like foundation, facial creams, body creams, makeup removers, facial masks, rubor, lipstick, nail polish and more.

loans.use: to buy foundation, facial creams, body creams, makeup removers, facial masks, lipstick, blush, nail polish and more.

loans.name: Ruth Del Socorro

texts.es:
Doña Ruth, sigue con su negocio de venta de tropigas, leña, frijoles cocidos, siendo muy demandado por los clientes, tiene la ayuda de su esposo que labora como agricultor y conductor, teniendo mejores ingresos sus hijos casados.
Ruth, con este financiamiento, continuara con la construccion de levantamiento de paredes, y poner techo, el cual tiene el zinc y perlines para su levantamiento, comprando solo cemento, arena para el acabado de paredes. Que ha sido posible a corto plazo con los financiamiento otorgado en Afodenic.
texts.en:
Doña Ruth still has a business selling gas cylinders, firewood and cooked beans, all of which are in great demand by her customers. She gets help from her husband, who works as a farmer and driver. Their married children have higher incomes. 

With this loan Ruth will continue construction on her home, putting up walls and a roof. She already has the zinc and beams for the roof but still needs cement and sand to finish the walls. Ruth has been able to do this more quickly thanks to the loan she has received from Afodenic.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand and labor to install a zinc roof.

loans.name: Abdel Wahhab

texts.en:
Abdel Wahhab is a 24 year old, single man from Lebanon, a place known for its friendly and welcoming people. He’s living in a house with his parents and four siblings. Abdel Wahhab and the whole family cooperate together wishing to bring added income and to enhance their way of life. 

Their father is the one responsible for monitoring their everyday expenses. Three of his siblings work as well  to take some responsibilities off of their father. As for Abdel Wahhab, this ambitious young man started his own home business in 2009. His job consists of restoring and implementing software into computers. 

He works with high professionalism and always seeks to better improve his knowledge. This is why he would like to borrow a youth loan from Kiva Partner Ameen s.a.l to purchase a laptop for his work. Definitely, this will boost his work and facilitate his business operations. His future dreams are to be able to take bigger projects and little by little grow as a businessman in his location.

loans.use: to purchase a laptop for his work

loans.name: Tamar

texts.en:
Tamar is 62 years old and married. She lives in a small village of Sagarejo District. Tamar is busy with her agricultural activities. She has three milking cows and sells milk to the merchants. She also has a plot of land where wheat is grown. Tamar and her husband have 50 sheep and they sell lambs in the spring on the local open market. The total average monthly income of the family is 500 Lari. 

Tamar is requesting a loan, which she will use to sow sunflowers. Tamar will be busy with the plot in the spring and summer. She will perform seasonal agricultural works to get a good harvest. With the increased profit she will be able to reinvest in the family agricultural business to expand it and make it more profitable as well as improve the living conditions of the family.

loans.use: to sow sunflowers.

loans.name: Marine

texts.en:
Marine is 49 years old. She lives in a small village in the Sagarejo District with her family: husband – David, 25-year-old son, daughter-in-law and mother-in-law, who is a pensioner. Her husband is a driver. He drives a tractor and helps the local population with their agricultural activities. He gets a service fee for the work. The family earns their living through an agricultural business. They have six pigs and 12 piglets. They sell piglets on the local open market. The total average monthly income of the family is 1000 Lari.

Marine requested a loan for purchasing food for the pigs. Marine is a very hard working woman; she keeps her livestock in good condition and takes good care of them. Marine will purchase quality, natural food for piglets. As a result of the loan, the family will be able to keep their pig farm running and receive the planned income, which is the main source of income for the family.

loans.use: to purchase food for pigs

loans.name: Martha Azucena

texts.es: Martha Azucena tiene 52 años, Desde hace 21 años tiene instalado en el mercado su puesto de venta de frutas y verduras  Todos los días ofrece a sus clientes una variedad de frutas frescas los cuales adquiere en el mercado mayorista en Managua. Este negocio es una fuente importante de ayuda a la familia. El negocio de Martha siempre cuenta con clientes que prefieren su buen trato y amabilidad pero sobre todo la calidad de fruta que vende. El préstamo es para adquirir productos como plátanos, cebollas, tomates, sandias, papayas, maní entre otros. Martha es muy trabajadora y entregada a su familia, Su mayor anhelo es seguir creciendo como empresaria.
texts.en:
Martha Azucena, 52, has sold fruits and vegetables in a stall in the market for 21 years.  Every day she sells her customers a variety of fresh fruit, which she gets in the wholesale market in Managua.  This business is an important source of help for her family.  Martha's business always has customers who prefer her good manner and kindness, but especially the quality of the fruit she sells.

The loan is to get products such as bananas, onions, tomatoes, watermelon, papaya, and peanuts, among others.

Martha is very hardworking and devoted to her family.  Her greatest desire is to continue to grow as a businesswoman.

loans.use: to buy bananas, onions, tomatoes, watermelon, papaya, and peanuts.

loans.name: Jose Dolores

texts.es:
José, se dedica al cultivo de granos básicos, está soltero, tiene 21 años, vive con sus padres, lleva 4 años realizando la actividad, la aprendió de su padre con quien ha trabajado sembrando maíz, ha adquirido experiencia porque está realizando sus propias milpas.
El solicita un préstamo para la compra de abono, herbicidas, pesticidas, para poder iniciar la preparación del terreno, con estos materiales podrá prevenir y fortalecer la siembra, esperando tener una buena producción de granos básicos-
La aspiración de José con su trabajo es mejorar su futuro con la producción del maíz, que sea mas provechosa.
texts.en:
Jose is a farmer who cultivates staple grains.  He is 21 years old, single, and lives with his parents.  He has been doing this work for 4 years.  He learned to farm from his father, with whom he worked cultivating corn.  Through this work he acquired experience, and now cultivates his own corn fields.

He is requesting a loan to buy fertilizer, herbicides, and pesticides so that he can start preparing his land.  With these supplies he will be able to prevent problems and strengthen his crops.  He hopes to have a good production of his staple grains.

With his work producing corn, which is the most profitable, Jose aspires to improve his future.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, herbicides and pesticides

loans.name: Rola

texts.en:
Rola is a 32-year-old single woman. She depends on herself and has her own project which is programming computers and designing advertisements. She has her own customers among the public and companies as well. It is becoming a profitable project and is her only  source of income.

Rola wants to improve the quality of her work and deliver the requested work to customers more quickly, so she is requesting a 2,000 USD loan from FATEN to help her cover the costs of purchasing additional computers. This will improve and maximize her work and satisfy her customers, which will help to build good reputation for her work and offer her a bright future. Rola is photographed in her office.

loans.use: To purchase computers to improve her work

loans.name: Rhoda

texts.en:
Rhoda is aged twenty-seven and a mother of one child aged six years. She has three years of experience in farming in her rural home in the Nkubu area of Central Kenya and produces cabbages, potatoes, maize, beans and fish among other products.

Rhoda has requested a loan of 40,000 KES from Juhudi Kilimo to buy poultry birds for a venture into poultry farming .She says this will enable her to generate income throughout the year unlike other farming activities which are done on a seasonal basis. She plans to acquire more parcels of land to build a bigger fish pond.

Rhoda says poor transport networks and high cost of inputs like pesticides remain the leading challenges in the farming business.

loans.use: To buy poultry birds

loans.name: Bahati

texts.en:
Bahati lives with her three children in Kwale town. There she sells charcoal wholesale to restaurant operators. She also sells farm produce like green vegetables, tomatoes, and potatoes. 

Her goal for the future is to have a wholesale outlet and a warehouse to distribute to other vendors. Right now, she is applying for a micro-loan, the second financial loan she's made with the Yehu Microfinance Trust, with which she will buy sacks of charcoal for resale. She intends to use these products to widen her clientele and make greater sales. As this happens, her dream is to acquire a vehicle for a transport business and guarantee a successful future for her children.

loans.use: to buy sacks of charcoal for resale.

loans.name: Nueva Vida Group

texts.es:
El grupo Nueva Vida está conformado por tres personas trabajadoras y emprendedoras una de ellas es Silvia quien desde hace 24 años vende tamal, pinol y pinolillo; también comercializa trucha. Ella cuenta con la ayuda de su esposo e hijos. 
El crédito lo invertirá en maíz, hoja, cal y leña.
Las otras integrantes son Teresa de Jesús en la venta de cosa de horno y Liliam venta de verduras desde hace 6 años.
texts.en:
The Group “Nueva Vida” (New Life) is made up of 3 hard-working, entrepreneurial people. One of them is Silvia, who has been selling tamales, pinol and pinolillo (cornmeal and cacao beverages); she also sells trout. She counts on help from her husband and children.
The loan she is requesting will be invested into corn, leaves, lime and kindle.
The other members include Teresa Jesús who sells things that go in the oven and Liliam who sells vegetables for over 6 years.

loans.use: buy corn, leaves, lime and kindle to make tamales and pinolillo (cornmeal and cacao beverage).

loans.name: Leyser Alexander

texts.es: Leyser Alexander tiene la actividad económica de brindar el servicio de cantos religiosos. Inicio hace más de 9 años por lo que desde muy joven le gustaba este medio de vida, pues siempre está dispuesto a mejorar y sacar adelante a su familia. Actividad inicio por  herencia de trabajo que su papa le enseño, que es brindar este servicio, El financiamiento es brindarle reparaciones a su unidad de transporte y comprar otros instrumentos como pianos, guitarras entre otros, El desea seguir prosperando para mejorar sus condiciones y la de su familia.
texts.en: Leyser Alexander has a business providing religious music.  He started this business more than 9 years ago, because from the time he was very young he always enjoyed this type of work, and he is always ready to improve and get ahead with his family.  He inherited this line of work from his father, who taught him how to provide this service.   He will use this loan to do some repairs to his vehicle and to buy some other instruments, such as pianos, guitars,  etc.  He hopes to continue to prosper so that he can improve the living conditions for himself and his family.

loans.use: to buy other instruments such as pianos, guitars, etc.

loans.name: Zahiya

texts.en:
Zahiya is a friendly and kind young woman. She’s from Lebanon and is 23 years old. She got engaged a short time ago and is awaiting the perfect time to have her own house and family. She lives with her family of three siblings and two lovely parents. 

Since they were kids, her father, a taxi driver, used to manage the family expenses and still does. Her mother as well does not hesitate to show help whenever needed. Zahiya and two of her siblings are working really hard to provide the family with added income. And since Zahiya noticed that their income does not satisfy their needs, she decided to launch her clothing business from her home with the small amount of money she already had. 

Zahiya sells a wide variety of women's and kids' clothes from which she earns a fair amount of money daily. To better develop her work, she’s requesting a youth loan from Kiva Partner Ameen s.a.l. She will be utilizing the loan to buy more merchandise for her business, such as pants, T-shirts and many other items. This will allow her to offer a greater variety of products and thus improve her income. Zahiya wishes to get married very soon and have her own clothing shop.

loans.use: to buy more merchandise for her business, such as pants, T-shirts and many other items

loans.name: San Isidro Group

texts.es:
Don Abrahan es uno de los integrantes de un grupo llamado San Isidro el cual está integrado por nueve personas muy amables y trabajadoras; cada una de ellas tiene una actividad económica la cual desarrollan con la finalidad de obtener más ingresos para brindar a sus familias una mejor calidad de vida. Este grupo se encuentra en la comunidad de La Tabaquera en la cual los habitantes se dedican al cultivo y siembra de caña.

Don Abrahan tiene la edad de 69 años, no tuvo la oportunidad de estudiar, pero desde muy pequeño aprendió a trabajar para ganarse la vida. Abrahan es propietario de una tienda de comestibles la cual se ubica en su casa, él ya tiene 12 años de experiencia con su negocio y poco a poco su haa progresado y ha invertido en la compra de los productos que sus clientes le piden como listones y hilos. Don Abrahan trabaja arduamente en su tienda y necesita este préstamo para invertirlo en la compra de huevos, jugos, refrescos, dulces, arroz, frijol, sopa, galletas, leche, listones e hilos para resurtir su negocio. Él piensa que el crecimiento de su negocio le ayudará a generar más ingresos. Con los ingresos adicionales, Abrahan será capaz de proporcionar mejores condiciones de vida para su familia y proveer sus necesidades diarias.

Los demás integrantes del grupo son:

Rumualda: siembra y cultiva caña. 
Susana: vende refrescos.
Raymunda: vende ropa. 
Teresa: vende refrescos.
Lourdes: vende carne. 
Magdalena: vende pollo. 
Brijida: vende comida. 
Laudelina: vende pollo.
texts.en:
Don Abrahan is a member of a group called San Isidro which is made of 9 friendly and hard-working people. Each one of them has an economic activity that he or she has developed in order to earn more income and provide a better quality of life to his or her family. The group is located in the community of La Tabaquera where most residents work growing and planting sugarcane. 

Don Abrahan is 69 years old. He never had the chance to go to school and from a very young age learned to work in order to support himself. Abrahan is the owner of a grocery store, located in his home. He has 12 years of experience with his business and little by little has advanced and has invested in buying the products that his customers request, like ribbons and thread. Don Abrahan works very hard in his store and needs this loan to invest in  buying eggs, juices, sodas, candy, rice, beans, soup, cookies, milk, ribbons and threads to restock his store. He believes that the growth of his business will help to generate more income. With the extra income, Abrahan will be able to provide a better quality of life to his family and meet all of their daily needs. 

The other members of the group are: 

Rumualda: plants and grows sugarcane. 
Susana: sells drinks.
Raymunda: sells clothes. 
Teresa: sells drinks.
Lourdes: sells meat. 
Magdalena: sells chicken. 
Brijida: sells food. 
Laudelina: sells chicken.

loans.use: to buy eggs, juice, soda, candy, rice, beans, soap, cookies and milk.

location.town: La Tabaquera, Acatlan de Perez Figueroa, Oaxaca

loans.name: Hussein

texts.en:
Hussein is a Lebanese single man. He’s 25 years old. He’s an only child for his parents, and the three live in their house that is located in one of the most beautiful villages of Lebanon. He, together with his father, manages their own household. His father owns a vegetable shop in his town; his regular customers are his neighbors and the local community. At this time, Hussein is working nonstop to provide his family with the needed income. 

Hussein has been working in his own bakery for many years and he’s well known for his good place and delicious food.  The most popular type of bread is the Lebanese one, and it’s baked during the morning and sold steaming hot to early commuters. He has loyal customers always asking for his delightful bread. Today, he has the intention to take out a youth loan from Kiva Partner Ameen s.a.l. to buy raw materials like flour, sugar, and butter, which he needs to continue production and expand his product inventory. He expects a boost in his business income as he expands his business. 

In the near future, Hussein has more than a few ideas to try out in his domain, and he thinks of taking more Kiva loans to achieve his goals, especially with the great result obtained from his first one.

loans.use: to buy raw materials like flour, sugar, and butter

loans.name: Gabriel

texts.es:
Gabriel es un hombre de 50 años, casado, vive en la ciudad de Ica en el distrito de Parcona con su esposa e hijos; Gabriel siempre ha sido un hombre muy trabajador y entusiasta, desde muy joven siempre ha realizado diversos trabajos con el objeto de sacar adelante a su familia, lamentablemente por falta de recursos económicos no pudo cursar la carrera de Ingeniería de Sistemas que tanto quería, pero gracias a su esfuerzo pudo estudiar una carrera de Técnico en Computación; en sus ratos libres le gusta ver programas educativos y noticieros en la TV y en algunas ocasiones le gusta preparar un riquísimo “Arroz con Pollo” para compartir gratos momentos con su familia.
Con mucho entusiasmo y dedicación, Gabriel trabaja como chofer de mototaxi, ya que cuenta con una mototaxi propia la cual le ayuda mucho a laborar, él dedica a su negocio un aproximado de 10 horas diarias, en las cuales puede atender hasta 40 clientes, él cree que su negocio marcha bien debido a su amabilidad, respeto y buen trato hacia sus clientes. 
Gabriel se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar el mejoramiento de su vivienda, tales como la puesta de ventanas, puertas y pisos para los cuartos de sus hijos; de esta manera Gabriel mejorará su hogar y podrá brindarles un mejor ambiente para el desarrollo de sus hijos.
texts.en:
Gabriel, 50, is married and lives in the city of Ica in the district of Parcona with his wife and children.  Gabriel always has been a very hardworking and enthusiastic man.  In his free time he likes to watch educational programs and the news on television, and sometimes he likes to make a delicious chicken and rice to share pleasant times with his family.

From a very young age he has done different jobs, with the goal of giving his family a good start.  Unfortunately, because of lack of resources he was unable to study systems engineering as he wanted to.  Thanks to his effort, though, he was able to study to be a computer technician. 

Gabriel works as a motorcycle taxi driver with great enthusiasm and dedication.  He has his own motorcycle taxi, which helps him a lot in his work.  He devotes about 10 hours a day to his business and can serve up to 40 customers.  He believes his business is going well because of his kindness, respect, and good manner with his customers.

Gabriel is very grateful to the Kiva lenders because thanks to their help he will be able to make improvements to his house, such as putting in the windows, doors, and floors of his children's rooms.  This way Gabriel will improve his home and be able to give his children a better environment for their growth.

loans.use: to make improvements to his house.

loans.name: Elda Maritza

texts.es: La señora Elda Maritza tiene 9 años con su negocio de venta de mercadería en general. Esta solicitando un préstamo para poder invertir  en las mejoras de su casa ya que  tiene cinco años de querer hacer pero por falta de dinero no lo había hecho , el financiamiento lo quiere para comprar material de construcción como : zinc, cemento, clavos, alfajillas, pinturas, bloques entre otros..
texts.en: Elda Maritza has had a business selling general merchandise for 9 years.  She is requesting a loan to invest in improvements to her house, because she has wanted to do this for 5 years but has lacked the money.  She needs a loan so that she can buy construction materials such as: sheets of corrugated metal roofing material, cement, nails, saw timber, paints, cements blocks, and other construction materials.

loans.use: to buy construction materials such as: sheets of corrugated metal roofing material, cement, nails, saw timber, paints, cements blocks, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous Group

texts.fr: La cliente est présidente du groupe d’affaire Tuchukuliane, âgée de 46 ans, mariée, mère de 11 enfants dont l’un fut décédé. Tous ses enfants étudient. Son conjoint est  un enseignant.  Elle est  vendeuse d’huile de palme. Elle  commença son business  avec son fonds propre reçu de son mari, plus tard, elle bénéficia un fond additionnel de crédit de l’IMF  Hekima et cela, vers les années 2002, après éruption du volcan Nyiragongo. Elle installe ses produits  au le marché. Il vient de réaliser 21 cycles de crédit dans le programme de Hekima. Ce nouveau crédit doit lui servir de s’approvisionner  avec  6 bidons d’huile de palme. En plus, elle ambitionne acheter une parcelle et construire une belle maison. La cliente salut l’initiative de l’IMF Hekima pour  ses actions en faveur de pauvres femmes exclues de banque classique.
texts.en:
The borrower is a client of MFI Hekima and the president of theis business group called Tuchukuliane. She is 46 years old, married, and the mother of 11 children, of whom one is deceased. All her children study. Her husband is a teacher. She sells palm oil. She began her business with her own money received from her husband. Later on, she got additional funds through a loan from MFI Hekima, around the year 2002, after the eruption of the Nyiragongo volcano. 

She displays her products at the market. She has taken out and repaid 21 loans with the Hekima program. This latest loan will serve to allow her to buy six jerrycans of palm oil for resale. Moreover, she aspires to buy a plot of land and build a nice house. This client salutes Hekima's initiative in its work with poor women who don't have access to conventional banking services.

loans.use: to buy six jerrycans of palm oil

loans.name: Josselyn Lisbeth

texts.es:
Josselyn, ella tiene 20 años de edad, vive con su esposo y tiene un hijo y vive con su madre, ella administra una tienda de productos domésticos, desde hace tres años, este lo aprendió de sus padres, tiene ya mucha clientela.
Ella solicita un préstamo, porque quiere comprar mercadería como arroz, huevos, frijoles, azúcar, pollo, pan, boquitas, este crédito le ayudara a mejorar las ventas y atender mejor las demandas de los clientes.
El objetivo de Josselyn  es fortalecer el negocio y ofrecerles una mejor calidad a su familia y a su hijo.
texts.en:
Josselyn, 20, lives with her husband.  She has a child and lives with her mother.  She has run a general store for three years.  She learned this work from her parents and she already has a lot of customers.
